loans.use: to purchase items to sell, like condiments and other groceries.

loans.name: Shulin

texts.en:
Shulin is married with two children, one of whom attends school while the other is still too young. She owns a house that has electricity but no piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is school fees.

For the past three years, she has operated a cosmetic shop business, her potential customers being town dwellers and neighbors, especially women. She dreams of expanding her business to meet her family's basic needs.

With the loan that she is requesting, she wants to purchase perfumes, lipsticks and body lotions. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business

loans.use: to purchase perfumes, lipsticks and body lotions

loans.name: Jose Daniel

texts.es:
José es un joven de 22 años de edad, un hombre soltero, sonriente, honesto amante de los animales, se dedica a atender un negocio peluquería canina y felina el cual inició en el año 2012. 

José trabaja pro obtener su libertad financiera y tiene una pequeña inspiración, la cual lo llena de felicidad cuando llega a su casa y ve a su hija diciéndole papá, esto es lo que lo motiva a trabajar y salir adelante día a día.

Pensando en mejorar su negocio el joven solicita un préstamo para mejorar los guacales, enseres para la sala de belleza canina y felina.
texts.en:
José is a 22-year-old, single young man, who is smiley, honest, and an animal lover. He makes a living by running a dog and cat grooming business, which he started in 2012.

José is working to gain financial liberty. He has a little inspiration, who fills him with happiness when he arrives home and sees her, his daughter, saying, "Daddy." This is what motivates him to work and move forward day by day.

With the improvement of his business in mind, this young man is requesting a loan to improve the crates and equipment for the dog and cat beauty salon.

loans.use: to improve the crates and equipment for the dog and cat beauty salon

loans.name: Sogbedji

texts.fr: Segbedzi est une veuve femme  âgée de 55 ans qui vit à Tokoin. Mère de trois enfants, Segbedzi est une revendeuse des produits alimentaires qu’elle s’approvisionne deux fois par mois  au marché et le revend à la devanture de son domicile. Segbedzi sollicite ce prêt pour commander des bols de sucre, de farine de manioc et d’arachides. Avec la marge bénéficiaire qui en résultera suite à une bonne vente, Segbedzi compte améliorer sa prestation de vente et aider ses enfants dans leur éducation scolaire puis à leur épanouissement.
texts.en: Segbedzi is a widow, 55 years old, residing in Tokoin. The mother of three, she is a retailer of grocery items, which are supplied twice a month from the market. She resells the merchandise in front of her home. Segbedzi is requesting this loan to order bowls of sugar, cassava flour, and peanuts. With the resulting profits from the sales, she plans on improving her offerings and helping to educate her children and thus their development.

loans.use: to purchase 10 bowls of sugar, 13 bowls of cassava flour, and 10 bowls of peanuts.

loans.name: Koudjouka

texts.fr: Koudjouka est une femme mariée habitant à Tokoin et qui a deux enfants à sa charge. Agée de 24 ans, Koudjouka est une esthéticienne de verni qui vend des produits de beauté et qui parcourt dans les quartiers environnant. Koudjouka fait son approvisionnement deux fois par mois au marché et désire ce prêt pour acheter des douzaines de crèmes de beautés, de savons des triplets de maquillages en vue d’en tirer un maximum de profit afin de pouvoir subvenir aux besoins de ses enfants et améliorer les conditions de vie quotidienne de sa famille.
texts.en: Koudjouka is a married woman living in Tokoin who has two children to take care of. At the age of 24, Koudjouka is a nail esthetician who sells beauty products and roams through the nearby neighborhoods. Koudjouka stocks up twice a month at the market and would like this loan to buy a few dozen beauty creams, soaps, and makeup sets in order to maximize profits to be able to meet the needs of her children and improve the daily living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to buy three dozen beauty creams, three dozen soaps, and two make-up sets.

loans.name: Maria Josefina

texts.es: María tiene 55 años de edad, de estado civil soltera, ella es una persona tranquila y optimista en su trabajo, ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de chanchos, ella empezó en este negocio hace 15 años atrás transformándose en fuente de ingresos que ayuda con varios gastos de su familia. Ella necesita el dinero para comprar más chanchos, así podría obtener más ingresos para poder seguir ayudando y cubrir con los gastos de su humilde hogar.
texts.en:
Maria is 55 years old and single, she's an easy-going person who's optimistic about her work. Her job is raising and selling pigs, a business that she started 15 years ago and has transformed it into a source of income to help with various family expenses.

She needs money to buy more pigs, so that she can obtain more income to keep helping to cover her humble household's expenses.

loans.use: To acquire more pigs for her business.

loans.name: Santiago Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “SANTIAGO” iniciará el tercer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal Collpani, está compuesta por ocho integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Virginia es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de electrodomésticos, venta de ropa, venta de gorras, servicio de decoración de salones, venta de calzados,  venta de pasteles y masitas, venta de dulces, venta de celulares.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiará a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Virginia es integrante, ella indica que es hace tres ciclos que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de electrodomésticos; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió de su amiga y decidió emprender su propio negocio hace varios años.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará será para el aumento de capital (compra de electrodomésticos por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de Oruro y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es casada y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud y las capacitaciones que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The Santiago communal bank will begin it's third cycle in Pro Mujer, as part of the Collpani Regional Office. It is made up of eight members and is managed by a Board of Directors of which Virginia is President. The business in which the members are engaged in are varied and include selling home appliances, clothing, hats, salon decorations, socks, cakes and cookies, candies, and cell phones.

The loan they will take out will benefit small micro-enterprises, including the one Virginia runs. She says that three cycles ago she became a member of Pro Mujer upon the invitation of a friend who is a client of the institution. She currently has a business selling home appliances. It is a trade that she learned from a friend and she decided to open her own business years ago.

The loan she will take out will be to increase her capital by purchasing home appliances wholesale, which she will obtain from the wholesale merchants in Oruro. Then she will market them in her shop. This type of work allows her to generate income to support her family financially since she is married and has three children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says she likes the health area and trainings that the institution offers.

loans.use: to purchase home appliances wholesale.

loans.name: Amina

texts.en:
Amina is a 27-year-old Lebanese housewife who is married and has a school-aged child. Her husband is the main income source in the family, and he works very hard to fulfill the family’s needs and lifestyle.

Amina has applied for a 575 USD loan through Kiva’s partner Vitas s.a.l. to pay for her child’s school fees and supplies. She is grateful that Kiva and Vitas s.a.l. make it possible for her to pay these, and this makes her very happy and optimistic.

loans.use: to pay for her child’s school fees and supplies.

loans.name: Rubelyn

texts.en:
Rubelyn is 38 years old and lives in the municipality of Carles, Iloilo. She has an 11-year-old daughter who is the center of Rubelyn’s life and for whom she wants to succeed in life. The economic situation in her house isn’t the best and is the reason why she decided to find a way to provide for her family. So she started her small eatery, known as a “carenderia,” eight years ago. Aside from this, within her “carenderia” she also sells basic commodities.

Rubelyn works hard to obtain good profits from this business in order to give her daughter a good quality of life. She is a strong woman who always stays positive, even in a bad situation. With this, she is asking for a larger loan amount for additional capital to buy food ingredients such as meat, vegetables, food seasoning and cooking oil. Aside from this, Rubelyn needs additional capital to improve her store. She will buy basic commodities such as snack foods, candies, drinks, juices, spices, cooking oil, eggs, noodles and toiletries.

In the future, Rubelyn’s only wish is to improve her livelihood for the sake of her daughter.

loans.use: to buy meat, vegetables, food seasoning and cooking oil for her eatery, as well as basic commodities such as snack foods, candies, drinks, juices, spices, eggs, noodles, etc.

loans.name: Peter

texts.en:
Peter is a married man. He has one child. He operates a tailoring business where he makes clothes to sell and also buys clothes to sell. He has been involved in this business for four years. His business is located in a good area and his primary customers are locals.

He will use the Kes 50,000 loan to buy clothes to sell during the festive season. He hopes that in the future, he will have better living conditions. This is his second loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. The previous loan was repaid successfully. He will use the anticipated profits to buy another sewing machine.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell.

loans.name: Essi

texts.fr: Agée de 47 ans, Essi est une femme mariée qui vit à Tokoin sans enfant à charge. Pour favoriser son épanouissement, Essi vend des produits d’alimentations générales dans sa propre boutique et réalises son revenu grâce à ce commerce. Essi s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché. Pour commander des bidons d’huile, des sacs de riz, des cartons de lait peak et des sachets d’eau « Pure Water », Essi sollicite ce crédit pour financer son achat et pouvoir bien revendre puis avoir une bonne marge bénéficiaire afin de pouvoir subvenir à ses propres besoins quotidiens.
texts.en: At 47 years old, Essi is a married woman living in Tokoin with no children to care for. To flourish, Essi sells general food products in her own shop and makes her income thanks to this business. Essi stocks up twice a month at the market. To be able to order containers of oil, sacks of rice, boxes of peak milk and bags of Pure Water water, Essi is seeking this loan to finance her purchase and to be able to resell it and get a good profit margin to be able to meet her own needs.

loans.use: to buy five containers of oil, two sacks of rice, three boxes of peak milk, and 110 bags of Pure Water.

loans.name: Bhajahari

texts.en:
Bhajahari is a differently able, unmarried man from a small village in Mayurbhanj district, Odisha, India. He has a family of five. His father is a farmer by profession and his mother is a homemaker. He has two brothers: the younger one is studying in class 10 and the elder one is working as a daily wage labourer.

Bhajahari, being an independent-minded man, supplements the family income by running a grocery shop. He has been running this store for the last two years and has gained a loyal clientele base due to his humble behavior.

Bhajahari is requesting a loan of 15,000 Indian rupees (INR) from Kiva's partner People's Forum. He will use this loan to buy grocery and eatable items from big shops at wholesale rates and sell them at his shop with a small profit margin. He is confident that the business will grow and he will be able to repay the loan within the stipulated time.

Bhajahari is eagerly awaiting your generous hearts to help him.

loans.use: to buy grocery and eatable items from big shops at wholesale rates and sell them at his shop

loans.name: Marcia Ilia

texts.es: Marcia tiene 36 años, de estado civil soltera, tiene 3 hijos, Darwin de 15  y Cristina de 10  y Poleth de 4 años, todos ellos están estudiando en una escuela cerca de su localidad, ella es una persona tranquila y muy dedicada en su trabajo, ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de pollos, Marcia empezó en este negocio  hace 2 años atrás, este negocio se transformo en fuente de ingresos que ayuda alimentar a sus hijos sin descuidarlos. Ella necesita el dinero para aumentar el número de pollos, así podría obtener más ingresos para poder seguir ayudando y cubrir los gastos de alimentación y educación de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Marcia is 36 years old, single, and has 3 children. Darwin is 15, Cristina is 10, and Poleth is 4, and they're all students at a local school. She's a mild-mannered person who's very committed to her work, her job is raising and selling chickens. Marcia started this business 2 years ago, and it became a source of income to help feed her children and prevent them from having to do without. 

She needs the money to acquire more chickens, so that she can increase her income and keep helping to cover the costs of educating and feeding her children.

loans.use: To purchase and sell chicks.

loans.name: Aku Akofa

texts.fr: Mariée et mère de deux enfants, Aku est une femme âgée de 49 ans résidant à Tokoin. Aku est une marchande  de produits d’alimentations générales qui s’approvisionne de ses marchandises deux fois par mois au marché et le revend dans sa boutique à domicile. Aku demande ce prêt pour commander des bidons d’huile, des sacs de riz, de sucre et des boissons de cannettes en vue de mieux revendre et augmenter son stock puis maximiser son profit afin d’aider son mari à promouvoir l’éducation de ses enfants et à subvenir aux charges quotidiennes éprouvées par sa famille.
texts.en: A married mother of two, Aku is a 49-year-old woman living in Tokoin. Aku sells general food products and stocks up on her products twice a month at the market and resells it in her shop at home. Aku is asking for this loan to order containers of oil, sacks of rice and sugar, and canned drinks to augment her stock and sell more and maximize profits in order to help her husband pay for the education of her children and to meet the daily needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy 8 containers of oil, 4 sacks of rice, 4 bags of sugar, and 10 packages of canned drinks.

loans.name: Sara1 Group

texts.en:
Sawsan is the featured borrower for sara1 Group. She joined with her other group members to take this Al Majmoua loan because they have always been neighbors and friends. They are working hard to develop their businesses and live at the same time.

Sawsan is a 37-year-old Syrian married mother of three. Almost two years ago, she started preparing desserts from her house to help her husband in covering the needs and expenses of their children. She is a hard worker who has professional skills in this domain, and is well-known among her region for her tasty delicious desserts. Today, she is acquiring a loan from Kiva's field partner to buy a furnace to increase her production of desserts. Sawsan is the first lady on the right.

With respect to the other group members, Ragheda is the lady sitting in the middle and Eman is the first lady on the left of the photo.

loans.use: to buy a furnace to increase her production of desserts.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 26 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, posee negocio de ventas de productos de primera necesidad y venta de pan dulce ademas de eso es agricola, se dedica a esa actividad desde hace mas de un año y gracias a sus ventas es como puede salir adelante, el joven vive en casa propia con su esposa, el esta solicitando un credito para la compra de maiz, frijoles, aceite, pan dulce y desechables todo por mayor para poder continuar con sus ventas y asi tener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en:
This young man's face has been pixelated because he's 26 years old and lives in a dangerous area. He owns a business selling basic household items and pastries. In addition he's a farmer and has been doing that work for over a year. Thanks to his sales he's been able to pull through, and he lives in a house of his own with his wife. 

He's applying for a loan to purchase corn, beans, oil, pastries, and disposables wholesale to be able to continue with his sales and increase his income.

loans.use: To purchase corn, beans, oil, pastries, and disposables wholesale.

loans.name: Edwin Milton

texts.es: Edwin es un hombre trabajador de 37 años de edad que vive con su esposa y sus dos hijos una niña de 4 años y un varón de 6 meses de edad a los que siempre trata de brindar lo mejor. Él siempre busca la manera de salir adelante, por lo que se dedica a prestar sus servicios en un laboratorio médico, lo que le permite salir adelante. Edwin desea brindar mayor seguridad a su familia, por lo que hace decidido construir un nuevo cuarto en su vivienda, para que sus hijos tengan un lugar seguro, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: cemento, arena, grava, ladrillo y hierro para construir un cuarto en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Edwin is a hardworking 37 year-old man who lives with his wife and their two children; a 4 year-old girl and a 6 month-old son, to whom he always tries to give the best.

He is always looking for ways to get ahead and thus works offering his services in a medical laboratory, which allows him to support his family.

Edwin wants to offer his family more safety, which is why he has decided to build a new room in his home so that his children have a safe place. This is why he is applying for a loan with FUSAI to purchase cement, sand, gravel, bricks and iron in order to build a new room in his home.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, gravel, bricks and iron in order to build a new room in his home.

loans.name: Tatiana

texts.es:
Tatiana es una joven mujer de 25 años de edad, soltera, sin hijos, y estudia la carrera de bioquímica. 
Ella es inteligente, alegre y muy comprometida con sus estudios. Sus estudios lo realiza en una universidad privada situada en la zona de ‘Miraflores’ caracterizada por encontrarse el estadio de futbol donde se realizan campeonatos nacionales e internacionales además de conciertos y otros espectáculos, de clima templado y frio con una temperatura máxima de 14 grados centígrados.
Tatiana es de tez trigueña, cabello largo castaño y físico delgado, su lengua materna es el Aymará el cual ya no práctica porque estudia inglés. Su vida la realiza en casa de sus padres que trabajan, viven en una casa propia construida de ladrillo con techo de calamina que cuenta con agua potable energía eléctrica y alcantarillado. Ella estudia bioquímica y se encuentra en tercer año de cinco que dura la carrera, le gusta conocer los medicamentos, disfruta ayudando a las personas, Participa activamente en el cuidado de la salud de su comunidad, su carácter es de servicio. También trabaja como profesora de biología en una escuela cercana, “trabajo y estudio, mi trabajo me deja poco tiempo para estudiar y es por eso que necesito terminar rápido para obtener un mejor sueldo…” comenta. La ventaja de sus estudios es que puede desenvolverse en varios campos, la desventaja es la falta de dinero para pagar la matriculación. Su sueño es ser directora de la escuela donde trabaja, ella desea pagar la matrícula universitaria para poder continuar estudiando. Esta es la 1 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 2 años que realiza esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Tatiana solicita un préstamo para pagar la matrícula universitaria para poder continuar estudiando.
texts.en:
Tatiana is a young single 25 year old woman with no children. She is studying biochemistry.

Ella is intelligent, cheerful and very committed to her studies. She studies at a private university situated in the Miraflores area. The football stadium where national and international competitions take place is here as well as concerts and other shows. It has a mild cold climate with a maximum temperature of 14 degrees Celsius.

Tatiana is light brown, has long brown hair and is thin. Her mother tongue is Aymara which she doesn't use any more as she is studying English. She lives with her parents who work. They live in their own house constructed of brick with a metal roof that has potable water, electricity and sewage.

She is studying biochemistry and is in her third year of the five year course. She likes to know the medications and she enjoys helping people. She participates actively in the health care in her community, as she likes to serve others. She also works as a biology teacher in a nearby school. "I work and study. My work leaves me little time to study so for this reason I need to finish quickly to obtain a better salary", she commented. The advantage of her studies is that she can progress in a variety of fields, her disadvantage is the lack of money to pay her enrollment. Her dream is to become the director of the school she works at so she wants to pay her university fees to be able to continue to study. This is her first loan with the institution in the 2 years she has been studying.

For these reasons Tatiana is requesting a loan to pay her university enrollment so she can continue to study.

loans.use: to pay her university enrollment to be able to continue to study.

loans.name: Akossiwa

texts.fr: Agée de 37 ans, Akossiwa est  femme mariée qui vit avec ses deux enfants à charge et son mari à Tokoin. Bien consciente de son état de vulnérabilité, Akossiwa vend des produits de beauté et exerce un boulot d’esthéticienne de verni dans les quartiers environnant. Akossiwa achète ses produits au marché une fois par mois et gagne ainsi son revenu. Akossiwa désire ce prêt pour commander des douzaines de vernis, ciseaux et des paquets de faux ongles afin de satisfaire aux besoins de ses clients et maximiser son profit pour pouvoir couvrir ses charges quotidiennes éprouvées par sa famille et améliorer ainsi leur condition de vie.
texts.en:
Akossiwa, aged 37, is a married woman living with her two children in her care and with her husband, in Tokoin. Very much aware of her vulnerable situation, she sells beauty products and has a job as a [beautician’s supplier] in nearby districts. She purchases her products at the market once a month and earns an income as a result.

Akossiwa would like to have this loan to order dozens of nail polish, scissors, and packets of false nails, so as to meet the needs of her customer and maximize her profit. Then she could cover the demonstrated day-to-day expenses of her family members and thus improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase 12 dozen of nail polish, 15 units of scissors, and 20 packets of false nails.

loans.name: Fredrick

texts.en:
Fredrick is a married man with four children. For the past 28 years he has owned a store where he sells sugar, flour, rice, bread, soap and other items. His business is located in a busy area where his primary customers are locals. He says his biggest business challenge is inadequate working capital.

Fredrick has taken out and successfully repaid two prior loans through Kiva's field partner SMEP Microfinance Bank. He has now applied for a 50,000 KES loan to buy more stocks of sugar, flour, rice and other groceries. His business goal is to be a wholesaler within five years.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of sugar, flour, rice and other groceries for his store.

loans.name: Geraldine

texts.en:
Geraldine owns and operates a sari-sari (variety) store that sells various merchandise such as cooking oil, seasonings, coffee, powdered milk, pouch vinegar, soap, shampoo eggs and toiletries.
She is married and has a seven-year-old son. Her husband earns a living by being a driver.

Her sari-sari store is situated in front of her house and serves her neighbors. She would like to improve her earnings by purchasing soft drinks, liquors and assorted groceries. This is very essential for her business to grow. As a result many customers will come and her earnings will improve.

In the long run Geraldine will be able to invest her income to become financially stable and to continue support the welfare of her growing child.

loans.use: to purchase soft drinks, liquors, and assorted groceries

loans.name: Clarita

texts.en: Clarita is 43 years old and separated with 9 children.  She lives in Pan-ay Diot, Clarin Misamis Occidental. Clarita earns a living selling firewood in the village. She has been doing this for many years and she earns enough to support her children. Her earnings go to their daily family expenditures. She has requested this loan from GDMP to buy more firewood to resell to increase profit. She hopes to have more returns in order to generate additional income for the purpose of providing a better education for her children.

loans.use: To purchase more firewood to resell.

loans.name: Munavar

texts.ru:
Мунавар удивительная женщина. Она всегда придет на помощь ведь это ее профессия. Она работает врачом в местной больнице. Она гордо носит статус не только врача, но и жены и матери. Ее муж работает шофером в школе, а сыновья работают строителями. 
  У Мунавар есть свои увлечения. Она любит садоводства. Сейчас в ее плане выращивание винограда. Она планирует построить виноградник. Саженцы уже подрастают и уже пора строить. Для постройки виноградника нужно купить материалы (дерево и металлические трубы). Мунавар верит, что с помощью кредита она построить желаемый виноградник и станет еще счастливее.
texts.en:
Munavar is a remarkable woman.  She always helps others, as it is her profession.  She works as a doctor at the local hospital.  She is proud of her status as a doctor, wife and mother.  Her husband works as a driver for a school and her sons work in construction.

Munavar has a few hobbies; she is particularly fond of gardening.  She now wants to grow grapes and is in the process of starting a vineyard.  Her seedlings have started to grow and she now needs to set up trellises.  In order to do so, she needs to buy supplies such as wooden posts and metal wire.  Munavar is confident that, thanks to this loan, she will be able to start the vineyard she's been dreaming about and she will be even happier.

loans.use: to have her own vineyard.

loans.name: Charles

texts.en: Charles is a married man. He has 1 child. He describes himself as honest. He operates a farm where he grows maize, beans, and potatoes. He has been involved in this business for 5 years. His business is located in a fertile area and his primary customers are locals. He will use the KES 50,000 loan to buy farm inputs. This is his second loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. The previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs.

loans.name: Marie Renande

texts.fr: Marie a 26 ans. Elle est mariée et elle a trois enfants. Elle gère une activité où elle vend des boissons gazeuses, des boissons alcoolisées et des boissons énergisantes. Elle demande un microcrédit pour ajouter de nouvelles marques de boissons dans sa boutique. À l’avenir, elle souhaite attirer beaucoup plus de clients.
texts.en: Marie is 26, married, and the mother of three children.  She runs a small business and sells carbonated, alcoholic, and energy drinks.  She has requested a micro-loan in order to bring in new brands of drinks to her shop.  In the future, she would like to attract many more customers.

loans.use: to increase her stock of drinks.

loans.name: Egnovi

texts.fr: Egnovi est femme âgée de 33 ans qui vit à Tokoin. Mariée et mère de quatre enfants, Egnovi est une marchande de crèmes accompagné de pain qui s’approvisionne quatre fois par mois au marché et le revend à la devanture de son domicile puis dans les quartiers environnant. Egnovi désire ce crédit pour financer son achat de tas de crèmes et des dizaines de pains en vue de bien revendre et de tirer profit afin de gagner plus de revenus et pouvoir mieux contribuer aux charges de la famille.
texts.en:
Egnovi is a 33-year-old woman who lives in Tokoin. The married mother of four, she is a merchant of ice cream served with bread. She gets her supplies four times a month at the market and resells her merchandise in front of her home and also in nearby neighborhoods.

Egnovi would like to have this loan to finance her purchase of ice cream and dozens of bread with the aim of doing well in her sales and making a profit, thus earning more income and being better able to cover family expenses.

loans.use: to purchase 7 units of ice cream and 6 dozen of bread

loans.name: Mimose

texts.fr: Mimose, 53 ans, dans la ville de Hinche. Elle a cinq enfants. Elle vend des produits alimentaires et de boissons gazeuses depuis sept ans à son domicile et elle demande un microcrédit pour augmenter son stock de produits alimentaires. À l'avenir, elle espère gagner plus d'argent.
texts.en: Mimose is 53 years old and lives in the city of Hinche. She has five children. She has been selling groceries and carbonated beverages out of her home for seven years. She is asking for microloan so that she can increase her stock of groceries. In the future, she hopes to earn more money.

loans.use: buy cases of of condensed milk.

loans.name: Marine

texts.en: Marine is a 60-year-old married woman. She lives with her husband in the Martvili district. The family has a grain mill and they grind grain. In addition they have a calf, 2 cows, and a plot of agricultural land where they grow nuts. Marine needs to purchase hay for her cows and she decided to purchase additional hay to resell at a higher price. The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables her to get a loan of 5,500 GEL. With the loan she will purchase a large amount of hay that she will resell and also use to feed her cows. Marine awaits your support.

loans.use: to purchase a stock of hay for reselling, as well as, use to feed her cows.

loans.name: Delfina

texts.en:
Delfina is a married woman. She has 3 children. She describes herself as joyful. She operates a beauty salon where she offers beauty services and also sells beauty products. She has been involved in this business for 17 years. Her primary customers are locals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be inadequate working capital.

 She will use the KES 50,000 loan to buy more stock of beauty products. She hopes that in the future, she will educate her children to university level. This is her fourth loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Previous loans were repaid successfully. She will use the anticipated profits to pay school fees

loans.use: to buy more beauty products.

loans.name: Verónica Florentina

texts.es: Verónica es una madre de familia llena de metas y sueños, a Dios gracias con el apoyo del crédito su terreno compro  y la construcción realizo, ella gradece a los inversionistas de kiva por la confianza que le dieron, con este cambio ella está muy contenta pero no conforme pues nuevamente tiene la necesidad de un crédito que en esta ocasión lo invertirá en la compra de productos para su negocio de hilos, afortunadamente la demanda ha incrementado y eso es de gran beneficio para ella. Con esta inversión que realiza espera satisface mejor a sus clientes. Su mayor anhelo es fortalecer su negocio y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Verónica is mother to a family and a woman full of goals and dreams. She thanks God that a loan allowed her to buy land and realize the construction. She thanks the Kiva lenders for the confidence they showed in her. 

She is very happy with this change, but not satisfied, because she now needs another loan that she will use on this occasion to buy products for her thread business. Fortunately, the demand has risen, which is a great advantage for her. With this investment she hopes to increase customer satisfaction. 

Her greatest desire is to strengthen her business and improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy products for her thread business.

loans.name: Mélanie

texts.fr: Mariée et âgée de 34 ans, Mélanie est une femme qui vit à Tokoin. Sans enfant à sa charge, Mélanie est une revendeuse des objets en plastiques et des glacières. Mélanie s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché et le revend à domicile et en parcourant les quartiers environnant. Mélanie sollicite ce prêt pour commander des unités de glacières,  de sceaux en plastiques et des bassines noir en vue de mieux revendre puis de satisfaire parfaitement les attentes de ses clients et réaliser une bonne marge bénéficiaire afin d’aider son mari à subvenir aux charges et besoins quotidiens de la famille.
texts.en:
Mélanie, aged 34, is a married woman living in Tokoin. With no children to support, she is a retailer of plasticware and coolers (insulated containers). She gets her supplies twice a month from the market and resells the merchandise at her home and by circulating through nearby districts.

Mélanie is requesting this loan to order units of coolers and plastic pails and black basins with the aim of doing better in her sales and then satisfying fully the expectations of her customer. She could then realize a good profit to help out her husband in meeting the familys day-to-day needs.

loans.use: to purchase 2 dozen insulated containers, a dozen black basins, and 2 dozen plastic pails

loans.name: Gladys

texts.fr: Gladys a 39 ans, elle a deux enfants et elle vit en union libre. Elle revend des chaussures neuves et d’occasion. Elle demande un microcrédit pour augmenter son stock de chaussures. À l’avenir, elle souhaite faire progresser son activité et gagner des revenus plus élevés.
texts.en: Gladys is 39 years old.  She has two children and she lives in a common-law marriage.  She sells new and used shoes.  She has requested a micro-loan in order to increase her stock of shoes.  In the future, she would like to further grow her business and increase her income.

loans.use: to buy a stock of new shoes.

loans.name: Almerine

texts.fr: Almerine a 55 ans et elle déborde d’énergie. Depuis près de 30 ans, elle vend des produits alimentaires. Aujourd’hui cette femme mariée et mère de quatre enfants ne vend plus ses marchandises dans les rues. Elle possède une petite épicerie chez elle. Cette activité lui procure les ressources nécessaires pour subvenir aux besoins quotidiens de sa famille. Almerine demande un microcrédit pour augmenter son stock.
texts.en: Almerine is 55 years old and overflowing with energy. For nearly thirty years, she has been selling grocery items. Today, this married mother of four no longer sells her merchandise in the streets. She owns a small grocery store in her home. This business brings in the necessary resources to support her family. Almerine is asking for a micro-loan to augment her inventory of goods.

loans.use: to augment her inventory

loans.name: Yawavi

texts.fr: Mariée et mère de quatre enfants, Yawavi est une femme âgée de 39 ans résidant à Tokoin. Yawavi est une marchande du maïs et des œufs qui achète ses marchandises dix fois par mois au marché et le revend sous un hangar à la devanture de son domicile. Yawavi sollicite ce prêt pour commander des sacs de maïs en vue de stocker une plus grande quantité de marchandises puis maximiser son profit afin d’aider son mari dans l’éducation scolaire de ses enfants et aux charges quotidiennes éprouvées par la famille.
texts.en:
The married mother of four, Yawavi is 39 years old and residing in Tokoin. She is a merchant of corn and eggs, which she purchases ten times a month at the market. She resells her merchandise in a stall in front of her home.

Yawavi is requesting this loan to order sacks of corn with the aim of stocking up with greater amounts of merchandise and then maximizing her profit to help out her husband to cover their children’s education and the proven day-to-day expenses of the family.

loans.use: to purchase 2 sacks of corn

loans.name: Harusi

texts.en:
Harusi is a married mother of three children, all of whom attend school. She owns a house that has electricity, but no piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are school fees and household consumables.

For over two years, she has operated a food selling business, selling from her home to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her place of business. 

With the KES 20,000 loan she wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, tables, and chairs for her business. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to increase her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour, tables, and chairs for her business

loans.name: Lodania

texts.fr: Lodania a 32 ans et elle vend des vêtements d’occasion depuis six ans. Elle gère son commerce tout près de son domicile. Elle habite à Hinche avec son compagnon et sa fille. Elle demande un microcrédit pour augmenter son stock de vêtements. À l’avenir, elle espère gagner des revenus plus élevés.
texts.en: Lodania is 32 years old.  She has been selling used clothing for the past six years and is running her small business close to her home.  She lives in Hinche with her partner and her daughter.  She is taking this microloan in order to increase her stock of clothes.  In the future, she would like to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy used clothes.

loans.name: Liliane

texts.fr: Liliane, vit avec son mari et ses deux enfants. Elle vend depuis 14 ans des produits alimentaires tels que du riz, des pates, etc. Elle s’accroche à son activité malgré le fait qu’elle ait été victime d’un vol de marchandise il y a quelques mois. Aujourd’hui, elle achète en gros pour revendre en détail. Le prêt lui permet de renouveler son stock.
texts.en: Liliane lives with her husband and two children. For fourteen years, she has been selling grocery items, such as rice, pasta, etc. She hangs onto her business despite the fact that she was a victim of theft a few months ago. Today, she is purchasing wholesale to sell retail. The loan is enabling her to renew her inventory of goods.

loans.use: to purchase rice and flour

loans.name: Johanne

texts.fr: Johanne, vit avec son mari et ses deux enfants. Elle a mis sur pied depuis tantôt 10 ans une barque de produits alimentaires. Aujourd’hui, son activité fonctionne bien ; elle achète en gros et revend à des consommateurs finaux. Le crédit lui permet d’augmenter son stock.
texts.en: Johanne lives with her husband and two children. Nearly ten years ago, she set up a grocery business. Today, it is going well; she buys wholesale and resells to the final consumer. The loan is enabling her to augment her inventory of goods.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of milled corn

loans.name: Zafimahatratra

texts.fr:
Zafimahatratra est un homme dynamique de 51 ans. Il vit avec sa femme et ses 7 enfants dans une petite maison en ville. Il vend différents articles utiles dans la vie de tous les jours comme des radios, des calculettes, des piles, des torches.
Il veut diversifier les produits à vendre avec le prêt, il va acheter 4 radios, 10 cartes mémoires, 16 calculettes et d’autres produits différents. 
Il va utiliser les bénéfices pour la scolarisation de ses enfants et constituer de l’épargne pour assurer les imprévus.
texts.en: Zafimahatratra is an energetic 51-year-old man.  He lives with his wife and his seven children in a small house, in the city.  He sells various every day items such as radios, calculators, batteries and flashlights.  He would like to use his loan to diversify his stock of merchandise, so he is planning to buy four radios, 10 memory cards, 16 calculators, and other various items.  He will use his profits to pay his children school fees and to build up precautionary savings.

loans.use: to buy various items such as a radios, memory cards, calculators...

loans.name: Nongawende Group

texts.fr: Bibata est mariée et mère de 4 enfants tous scolarisés, elle est âgée de 44 ans. Elle vend de la friperie dans son quartier et cela fait 5 ans qu'elle exerce cette activité. Elle a besoin d'un prêt pour acheter 1 balle de drap de lit à 40 000 F, 1 balle de blouson pour enfant à 55 000 F et 1 balle d'habit pour enfants à 50 000 f pour vendre. Dans son quartier elle est la seule à vendre de friperie ce qui fait marcher son activité en plus de cela elle propose de friperie de qualité et aussi à bon prix à ses clients. Après ses ventes, elle aura un bénéfice qui lui permettra de faire des épargnes, de s'occuper de sa famille et aussi de continuer ses activités. Elle a déjà reçu le prêt une fois et à rembourser à la date prévue à ACFIME.
texts.en: Bibata is a married mother of four children, all of whom attend school. She is 44 years old. She has been selling secondhand clothing in her neighborhood for 5 years. She needs a loan to buy some bedsheets for 40,000F, some children’s jackets for 55,000F, and some children’s clothing for 50,000F to resell. In her neighborhood, she is the only one who sells secondhand clothing, which is what makes her business work. In addition, she offers quality secondhand clothing and at a good price to her customers. After the sales, she will have profits, which will allow her to have some savings, take care of her family, and also to continue her business. She has already received a loan once and repaid it by the due date at ACFIME.

loans.use: to buy bed sheets for 40,000F, a children's jacket for 44,000F, and children's clothing for 50,000F.

loans.name: Ana Mercedes

texts.es: Ana de 37 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y refrescos desde hace 10 años su negocio esta ubicado cerca de su lugar de residencia y tiene muchos clientes, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, ella esta solicitando un credito para la compra de mas variedad de frutas, azucar, hielo, entre otras cosas para poder continuar con sus ventas y asi tener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en:
Ana is 37 years old. She lives in her own home with her family. For the past ten years she has owned a business selling fruit and snacks. Her business is located close to her home, and she has many customers. With the money Ana earns she is able to cover some of her household expenses. 
She is requesting a loan to purchase a greater variety of fruits, sugar and ice, among other things, in order to continue with her sales and thereby earn more money.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of fruit, sugar and ice.

loans.name: Serapio

texts.es: Las personas que buscan superarse, no se detienen ante nada es el caso de Serapio una persona que con mucho sacrificio a su familia ha sacado adelante, la vida de Serapio ha cambiado profundamente  esto gracias a los créditos que ha obtenido  con Kiva y ADICLA, afortunadamente su negocio de verduras ha incrementado, pero Serapio no es una persona conformista por esa razón acude a un nuevo  préstamo para seguir invirtiendo en su negocio de verduras y vender  mejor por mayor.  Su gran sueño es fortalecer su negocio y mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
People who seek to improve themselves stop at nothing. This is the case of Serapio, someone who has sacrificed to get his family ahead. Serapio's life has changed profoundly thanks to the loans he has received through Kiva and ADICLA.

Luckily his vegetable business has grown, but Serapio is not a conformist, and for this reason he is asking for a new loan in order to continue investing in his business and sell wholesale.

His greatest dream is to build up his business and improve his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase plots of vegetables for his business.

loans.name: Erline

texts.fr:
Erline est une femme très dynamique de 41 ans. Elle est mariée avec 3 enfants à charge tous scolarisés. Elle tient un petit restaurant  depuis 7 ans et élèves quelques porcs.
Elle a déjà pris des prêts auparavant ou les bénéfices lui ont permis de réparer la maison familiale. Elle compte développer son activité d’élevage porcin en achetant 3 porcelets et 625 Kg de provende pour leur engraissement. 
L’éducation des enfants est primordiale pour Erline. Elle compte aussi acheter un terrain pour construire une autre maison plus grande.
texts.en:
Erline is a vey energetic woman who is 41 years old. She is married and supports three children, who are all in school. She has had a small restaurant for seven years and raises a few pigs.

She has already had loans before. The profits have enable her to work on the family’s house. She intends to develop her business raising pigs by purchasing three piglets and 625 kg of feed to fatten them.

The children’s education is primary for Erline. She also plans to purchase a plot of land to build another bigger house.

loans.use: to purchase 3 piglets and 625 kg of feed to fatten them

loans.name: Mamisoa

texts.fr:
Mamisoa est une paysanne de 32 ans, mariée avec 3 enfants à charge. Elle cultive du riz et de la pomme de terre et pratique l’élevage porcin et cela depuis 4 ans. 
Mamisoa a pris des prêts auparavant pour la culture de pomme de terre. Pour ce prêt, elle compte développer l’élevage porcin en achetant 1 porc à engraisser avec son alimentation. Elle compte aussi acheter des semences et des engrais pour cultiver du riz. Elle n’aura pas de difficulté à vendre le porc ainsi que le riz car le marché est encore très demandeur. 
Elle espère gagner des bénéfices avec ces activités afin d’améliorer la condition de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Mamisoa is a peasant woman, 32 years old, and the married mother of three children in her care. She grows rice and potatoes, and she has been raising pigs for four years.

Mamisoa has take out loans before for the purposes of growing potatoes. For this loan, she intends to develop her livestock farming of pigs by purchasing a pig to fatten and some feed. She also intends to purchase some seeds and fertilizer for growing rice. She will not have any problem selling the pig, as well as the rice, since the market is still very strong.

She hopes to earn a profit from her businesses, so as to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase a pig plus feed and some seeds and fertilizer for growing rice.

loans.name: Dieumene

texts.fr: Dieumène est âgée de 30 ans. Elle vit en union libre et a un enfant à charge. Elle revend des sous-vêtements. Cela fait déjà 5 ans qu’elle fait ce commerce. Elle cherche du crédit pour pouvoir augmenter son stock. A l’avenir, elle compte ouvrir un compte d’épargne avec les bénéfices de son activité.
texts.en: Dieumène is 30 years old. She lives in a common law relationship and has one dependent child. She has had a business reselling undergarments for five years, and is seeking a loan to increase her inventory. In the future, Dieumène plans to open a savings account with the income from her business.

loans.use: to increase her inventory

loans.name: Louisette

texts.fr:
Louisette est une femme âgée de 48 ans. Elle vit en ville avec son mari et son dernier enfant car les 3 ainés sont tous mariés actuellement. Pour assurer la vie au quotidien, Louisette vend et livre de l’huile de soja et d’arachide et cela depuis 2 ans. Elle gère aussi une petite gargote.
Pour ce prêt, Louisette compte acheter 360 litres de ’huile de soja dont une partie va être livrée et une autre à vendre dans son petit magasin avec la gargote. Elle est très connue dans le quartier et espère gagner de nouveaux clients durant ce prêt.
Elle a comme objectif d’acheter une voiture pour louer ce qui fera augmenter le revenu de la famille et réhabiliter sa maison.
texts.en:
Louisette is a 48-year-old woman. She lives in the city with her husband and her youngest child, as her three older children are all married. In order to make a living, Louisette has been selling and delivering soybean and peanut oil for two years. She also manages a little restaurant.

With this loan, Louisette plans to buy 360 liters of soybean oil, a portion of which will be delivered and another portion will be to sell in her small store with the little restaurant. She is well known in the neighborhood and hopes to get new customers during this loan.

She has the goal of buying a car to rent out, which will increase the family’s income which will go towards renovating her house.

loans.use: to buy 360 liters of soybean oil to sell.

loans.name: Charlotte

texts.fr:
Charlotte est une veuve de 54 ans. Elle loue une petite maison en ville et assure seule la vie quotidienne de ses 3 enfants. Elle vend des nattes et des paniers depuis 20 ans au grand marché de la ville. 
Elle avait déjà pris des prêts auparavant dont les bénéfices lui ont permis de démarrer une activité d’élevage porcin. Pour ce prêt, elle compte augmenter le stock de nattes en achetant différentes tailles et gammes afin de satisfaire les clients et d’attirer de nouveaux clients. 
Le rêve de Charlotte est de construire une maison pour ses enfants.
texts.en:
Charlotte is a 54-year-old widow. She rents a small house in town and is alone in ensuring that the needs of her three children are met. She has been selling mats and baskets for over twenty years at the big market in town.

She had already had loans before. The profits from them have enabled her to start a business raising pigs. For this loan, she intends to increase her stock of mats by purchasing different sizes and ranges, so as to satisfy her customers and to attract new ones.

Charlotte’s dream is to build a house for her children.

loans.use: to purchase 140 mats of different sizes to sell at the big market

loans.name: Henry Ruben

texts.es: Henry tiene 23 años, de estado civil soltera, es un chico responsable y muy eficaz con su trabajo, el se dedica a la crianza y venta de chanchos, Henry empezó en este negocio  hace 3 años atrás, este negocio es una gran fuente de ingresos que lo ayuda a salir adelante con los gastos de el y su madre, El necesita el dinero para aumentar el número de chanchos, así podría obtener más ingresos para poder seguir ayudando y cubrir los gastos de su hogar.
texts.en: Henry is 23 years old and he is single. He is a very responsible young man and is very efficient with his work. He raises and sells pigs. Henry began this business three years ago, this business is a great source of income which helps him keep up with his family's expenses. Henry needs the money to increase the number of pigs. This way he will be able to make more money and continue helping out and covering household expenses.

loans.use: to raise and sell pigs.

loans.name: Volatiana Claudine

texts.fr: Volatiana Claudine vous remercie beaucoup pour le crédit que vous lui avez accordé il y a quelques mois. Le remboursement était sans problème, régulier. Ledit crédit lui a permis de renforcer son fonds de roulement en achetant des marchandises de première nécessités supplémentaires. Son étalage est amélioré, le va et vient pour faire les approvisionnements sont réduits. Elle arrivent à épargner davantage par rapport auparavant. Elle voudrait continuer à aller encore de l'avant et à avancer: développer l'activité et augmenter le revenu afin de pouvoir réaliser son rêve d'acheter un terrain et construire une maison. La motivation et le courage s'élèvent de plus en plus.
texts.en: Volatiana Claudine thanks you so much for the loan that you granted her a few months ago. The loan was repaid with no problems and in a regular fashion. The loan allowed her to reinforce her working capital by buying supplementary first necessity products. Her displays are improved, and the coming and going for supplies has been reduced. She has been able to save more compared to before. She would like to continue to move forward: developing her business and increasing her revenue in order to be able to realize her dream of buying land and building a house. Motivation and courage are growing more and more.

loans.use: to buy 6 sacks of rice, 4 containers of oil, 2 bags of sugar, pasta, 2 bags of wheat flour, 2 bags of Madagascan rice flour, and bags of dried beans.

loans.name: 23 De Septiembre Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “23 DE SEPTIEMBRE” iniciará el décimo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal German Busch, está compuesta por diez  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Gloria es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de frutas, venta de dulces y galletas, venta de prendas de vestir de lana, venta de pantalones, venta de chamarras, venta de verduras, tienda de barrio, servicio de lubricantes, venta de masitas. 

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Gloria es integrante, ella indica que hace cinco años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una promoción de la institución que se realizó en su zona. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio tienda de barrio; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendido de su mamá y lo decidió implementar hace varios años.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará será para el aumento de capital (compra de abarrotes y refrescos por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es soltera y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud  y las capacitaciones que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The A.C. "23 DE SEPTIEMBRE" [23rd of September] will begin the tenth cycle in Pro Mujer [Pro Women], as part of the German Busch Focal Center it is composed of ten members and is directed by a board where Mrs. Gloria is president. 

The businesses that the members of the community association carry out are diverse, among them are: selling fruit, selling sweets and cookies, selling woolen clothing, selling pants, selling coats, selling vegetables, neighborhood store services, lubricants, selling pastries. 

The loan they will take out will benefit the small micro entrepreneurs where Mrs. Gloria is a member. She notes that it has been five years that Pro Mujer joined, entering by way of invitation from a promotion by the institution held in the area. Today she has a neighborhood store business; she explains that she learned this business from her mother and and decided to implement it many years ago. 

The loan she will take out is to increase capital (purchase of wholesale groceries and soft drinks) which she will acquire from the vendors in the city of El Alto and thereafter sell in her retail space. 

This form of work allows her to generate resources to support her family financially since she is single and has three children. When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the area of health and the training offered by the institution.

loans.use: purchase wholesale groceries and soft drinks

loans.name: Mayra Johanna

texts.es: Mayra tiene 25 años, de estado civil soltera, tiene una niña de cuatro meses de edad, ella es una persona muy frecuente y responsable con su trabajo, ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de pollos, Mayra empezó en este negocio  hace 3 años atrás, este negocio es una gran fuente de ingresos que le ayuda a salir adelante y así a futuro poderle dar una buena educación a su niña. Ella necesita el dinero para aumentar el número de pollos, así podría obtener más ingresos para poder seguir ayudando y cubrir los gastos de alimentación de ella y su hija.
texts.en:
Mayra is 25 years old, single, and has a four-month-old baby. 

She is constant and responsible in her work, which is raising and selling chickens. Mayra began this business 3 years ago, and it is an important source of income that helps her to make a living and in the future will allow her to give her daughter a good education. 

She needs the loan to increase the number of chickens and, in this way, earn more income to keep helping and cover the costs of food for herself and her daughter.

loans.use: to buy and then sell chickens.

loans.name: Sariris Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “SARIRIS” iniciará el quinto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal Collpani, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Rosa es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de comida, venta de ropa, venta de cerveza, venta de joyas por catalogo, tienda de barrio, venta de perfumes, venta de mochilas, venta de medias, venta de mandiles. 

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Rosa es integrante, ella indica que hace un año y medio que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de un promotor que es parte de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de tienda de barrio; da a conocer que este negocio lo inicio por iniciativa propia y con un pequeño capital con el que contaba. 

El crédito que ahora sacará será para el aumento de capital (compra de gaseosas y conservas por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella vive en unión libre y tiene cinco hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación y el área de salud que se brinda en la institución.
texts.en:
The Communal Bank “SARIRIS” will initiate its fifth loan cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of Centro Focal Collpani. It is composed of eight members and is directed by a directive committee of which Rosa is the President. The businesses that the members of the Communal Bank direct are varied. Among them are: food sales, clothing sales, beer sales , sale of jewelry by catalog, neighborhood store, sale of perfumes, sale of backpacks, sale of stockings, and sale of aprons.

The loan they are taking out will benefit small micro-businesses where Rosa is a member. She points out that she became a part of Pro Mujer a year and a half ago, joining through the invitation of a promoter who is part of the institution. Currently she has a neighborhood store and makes it known that this business was started through her own initiative and the little capital on which she counted.

The loan that she will now take out will be to increase capital (the purchase of wholesale sodas and canned food) which she will acquire from wholesale vendors in the city of El Alto and subsequently sell in her space. This form of work allows her to generate resources to support her family economically, since she cohabitates with her partner and has five children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the training and the general health that this institution offers.

loans.use: to buy wholesale sodas and canned food.

loans.name: Yanapasiñani Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “YANAPASIÑANI” iniciará el tercer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal Villa Exaltación, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Angelica es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de chompas, venta de juguetes, venta de frutas, venta de manta, venta de celulares, venta de ropa, tienda de barrio. 

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Angelica es integrante, ella indica que es la primera vez que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una vecina que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de enaguas; da a conocer que este negocio lo decidió emprender después de pasar unos cursos de costura y con un pequeño capital con el que contaba decide emprender su propio negocio.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará será para el aumento de capital (compra de tela por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente a la elaboración de enaguas, lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es casada y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta los ahorros que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The communal bank Yanapasiñani will begin its third loan cycle with Pro Mujer as part of the Centro Focal Villa Exaltación. It is made up of eight members and it is led by an executive board of which Angelica is the president. The businesses that the members of the communal bank carry out are varied, and among them exists: sweater sales, toy sales, fruit sales, blanket sales, cellular phone sales, clothing sales, and a neighborhood store.

The loan that they will take out will benefit small micro-enterprises of which Angelica is a member. She indicates that this is the first time that she joins Pro Mujer, through the invitation of a neighbor who is a client of the institution. She currently has a business selling slips. She communicates that she decided to launch this business after taking some sewing classes and with a small amount of funds that she had, she decided to start her own business.

The loan that she will take out will be for the increase in capital to purchase fabric in bulk, which she will acquire from the wholesalers in the city of El Alto and after, the production of slips which she will sell in her sales space. This type of work allows her to generate income to support her family economically, as she is married with two children.

When she is asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the savings that the institution offers.

loans.use: to buy fabric in bulk.

loans.name: Borres, Edeliza

texts.en:
Edeliza is 43 years old and married with two children, one child is still in school, Edeliza works very hard to provide for them.

Edeliza runs a general store in the Philippines, and requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy items to sell such as canned goods, personal care products, milk, noodles, spices, drinks, bread, shampoo and other snack foods.

Edeliza has been in this business for four years.

In the future Edeliza would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell such as canned goods, personal care products, milk, noodles, and other snack foods.

loans.name: Rosas Rojas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “ROSAS ROJAS” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal Santiago II, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Rosa es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de zapatos, venta de manta, venta de guantes, venta de ropa, venta de chamarra, venta de CD´s, venta de queso.
 
El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Rosa es integrante, ella indica que es la primera vez que integra  Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una promoción de la institución que realizaron en su zona. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de queso; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió de su hermana y lo decidió emprender hace varios años. 

El crédito que ahora sacará será para el aumento de capital (compra de queso por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es soltera y tiene tres hijos.  
Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación y la oportunidad en la otorgación de crédito que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The communal bank “ROSAS ROJAS” (Red roses) will begin its first cycle as part of the Santiago II focus group. It is made up of 8 members and led by a managing committee, of which Rosa serves as president. The businesses that the members of this communal bank operate are varied, among them are: shoe sales, blanket sales, glove sales, clothes sales, coat sales, CD sales, and cheese sales.
 
The loan they take out will help small micro-businesses, among which is Rosa. She said it was the first time she has participated in Pro Mujer, and she signed up on invitation following a promotion the institution realized in her area. 

At the moment she runs a business selling cheese; and she informed us that she learned the business from her sister and decided to start it several years ago. 

This loan she will use to increase her capital (buying more cheese in bulk). She will buy from the wholesale sellers in the city of El Alto and then sell it in her business. This means of working allows her to generate income and provide financial support to her family, since she is single and has three children. 

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says it is the training and the opportunity to obtain loans that the institution offers.

loans.use: to buy cheese in bulk.

loans.name: Ana Maria

texts.es: Ana de 58 años de edad vive en casa propia con su hijo, ella posee desde hace varios años una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia donde vende todo tipo de artículos, con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra salir adelante con los gastos del hogar, la clienta está solicitando nuevamente un crédito para la compra de mas granos básicos, aceite, sopas, golosinas, detergentes, jabón, refrescos, etc. para poder surtir su tienda y tener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en:
Ana, 58, lives in her own house with her son. For several years she has had a small store, which is located in her place of residence where she sells all kinds of items. With what she makes from her sales she manages to make ends meet with her household expenses.

Ana is asking once again for a loan for the purchase of more dry beans and grains, oil, soups, candies, detergents, soap, soft drinks, etc. to be able to stock her store and have better revenue.

loans.use: to buy more dry beans and grains, oil, soups, candies, detergent, soap, soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: Gerald

texts.en:
Gerald is a married man. He has two children. He describes himself to be focused. He operates a quarry where he sells building stones. He has been involved in this business for 10 years. 

His business is located in a busy area and his primary customers are locals. He describes his biggest business challenge to be inadequate working capital. 

He will use the 50,000 KES loan to buy quarry tools. He hopes that in the future, he will sell more stones.

loans.use: to buy quarry tools.

loans.name: Helen

texts.en:
Helen is 49 years old and has six children. Helen is married and has one child who is still in school.

Helen is in the agricultural, pig fattening business in the Philippines. Helen requested a 10,000 PHP loan through NWTF to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pig.

Helen has been in this business for two years now, and has borrowed six times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Helen would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy feeds and other supplies to raise her pig.

loans.name: Yameen

texts.en:
Yameen is a 35-year-old woman who lives in Lahore, Pakistan with her four children. Her husband is responsible for fulfilling the needs of the family. Yameen is also providing sewing services and earning an income to contribute to her husband to manage the household. 

She needs different kinds of goods, e.g.: needles, threads, pieces of cloth, machine oil, etc., for her business purpose. But due to insufficient financial means, she is unable to purchase these accessories. 

Therefore, she has applied for a Kiva loan from it's field partner, BRAC Pakistan. This loan will enable her to purchase the above accessories, which will be helpful for her to increase her monthly sales and profit by providing better sewing services.

Yameen is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan

loans.use: to increase her tailoring business.

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en:
Joyce is a married woman. She has three children. She describes herself to be joyful. She operates a retail business where she sells soap, cereals, bread, flour and other items. She has been involved in this business for six years. Her business is located in a busy area and her primary customers are locals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be inadequate working capital. 

She will use the 70,000 KES loan to buy more stocks of bread, soap, flour and other items. Her business goal is to own a supermarket within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will educate her children to a university level. 

This is her fifth loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Previous loans were repaid successfully. She will use the anticipated profits to pay school fees.

loans.use: to buy more stocks of bread, soap, flour and other items.

loans.name: Ma. Victoria

texts.en:
Ma. Victoria is a married woman with three children. Her oldest child is six years old, while the youngest child is one year old. Ma. Victoria lives a simple life in the city of Baybay, Leyte. Her husband is a construction worker and she helps him financially by making mats to sell.

Ma. Victoria wants to improve her business to enhance their livelihood and be able to provide for the needs of her children. She is requesting a loan to buy raw materials to make more mats. She will use buri leaves (the largest palm in the Philippines) and dye, to add color.

loans.use: to buy raw materials, including buri leaves and dye.

loans.name: Hipólita

texts.es:
Hipólita de 53 años de edad, no pudo estudiar ya que en sus tiempos eran escasas las posibilidades de acceso a la educación, es madre soltera de 2 hijos que ya son mayores de edad y no dependen de ella.

Hipólita tiene un negocio de ropa, ya tiene mas de 4 años en dicha actividad la cual aprendió de una amiga que era su patrona anteriormente, decidió independizarse y le ha dado buenos resultados, el negocio lo tiene e 2 km de su casa y se transporta en bus.

Ella solicita este crédito para comprar camisas, pantalones, calzonetas, blusas, ropa interior, etc. ya que viene la época navideña y las ventas son buenas.

Su sueño es tener un bazar de ropa y confía en Dios en que lo va a lograr.
texts.en:
Hipólita is 5 years old. She was unable to study, because when she was young, the possibilities for education were scarce. She is a single mother of 2 children who are grown and no longer dependent.

Hipólita has a clothing business. She has been in this business for more than 4 years. She learned it from a friend who previously was her boss. She decided to go into business for herself, and it has given her good results. The business is 2 kilometers from her house by bus. 

She is requesting this loan to buy t-shirts, pants, shorts, blouses, underwear, etc. because the Christmas holiday season is coming and sales are good then.

Her dream is to have a larger clothing store and she trusts in God that she will achieve this.

loans.use: to buy t-shirts, pants, shorts, blouses, underwear, etc. because the Christmas holiday season is coming and sales are good then.

loans.name: Javier David

texts.es:
Vivir en una zona de postconflicto donde las oportunidades laborales escasean nunca fue una excusa para Javier, este hombre de 35 años de edad el cual vive en unión libre con su pareja con la cual tiene tres hijos de 13, 2, 1 año de edad, se fabricó una oportunidad para generar recursos, montando un negocio de cría de cerdos el cual ha crecido con el pasar del tiempo, incluso tiene un cliente que compra al por mayor, lo que demuestra la responsabilidad y el compromiso de este luchador hombre que hace un esfuerzo gigante para llevarle el alimento diario a su amada familia.
Javier hoy necesita de tu apoyo, un impulso económico para aumentar el número de animales en su porqueriza y su número de pollos, por ello solicita un préstamo para comprar cerdos, pollos, gallinas, maíz y alimento de engorde.
texts.en:
Living in a post-conflict zone where work opportunities are scarce has never been an excuse for Javier. He is 35 years old and has a common-law marriage with his partner. Together they have three children, who are 13, 2, and 1 years old. He made his own opportunity to make money, starting a business raising pigs, which has grown with time. He even has a wholesale client, which demonstrates the level of responsibility and commitment on the part of this hardworking man who makes a huge effort to provide for his beloved family.

Javier needs your support for an economic push so he can increase the number of pigs in his corrals and his number of chickens. For this reason he is requesting a loan to buy pigs, roosters, hens, corn, and concentrated feed.

loans.use: to increase the number of pigs in his corrals and his number of chickens.

loans.name: Dario Jose

texts.es:
Dario es un hombre de 67 años de edad, casado sin hijos el cual se dedica a cultivar papayas, es un viejo zorro del campo que ha dedicado toda su vida a tan maravillosa profesión. 

Tal y como se ve en la foto su cultivo está en etapa de maduración y necesita de ciertos insumos para darles un debido mantenimiento, pero no cuenta con el capital, por esta razón solicita un préstamo para comprar insumos agrícolas tales como abonos y exterminadores de plagas.

No tiene hijos en quienes apoyarse es por esta razón que acude a la ayuda que será muy importante para sus terrenos, esperando obtener una producción abundante y de calidad.
texts.en:
Dario is 67 years old, married, and with no children. He farms papayas. He is an old fox in this field, as he has dedicated all of his life to this wonderful profession. 

As can be seen in the photo, the crop is in the ripening stage, and he needs certain inputs in order to give the plants the necessary maintenance, but he doesn’t have the capital. For this reason he is requesting a loan, in order to buy agricultural inputs such as fertilizers and pesticides.

He doesn’t have children to support him, so this is why he is requesting assistance, which will be very important for his land. He is hoping for an abundant and good quality harvest.

loans.use: to buy agricultural inputs such as fertilizers and pesticides for his papaya crop.

loans.name: Khurshed

texts.ru: Хуршед из района Муминобод. Он родился в 1977 году в семье дехканов. Его родители занимались животноводством и земледелием на районе. Трудя сельскохозяйственной деятельности, зарабатывали на жизнь. 5 лет назад Хуршед начал идти по стопам родителей. Он решил продвигать их деятельность и не сохранить источник дохода. Хуршед сейчас занимается коневодством. У него имеется конюшня. Он еще выращивает домашнее животные. Его жена занимается растениеводство, и поддерживает мужа. Хуршед хочет увеличить численность лошадей. Ему требуется немного денежных средств, по этой причине Хуршед запрашивает кредит. Он надеется на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Khurshed is from the Muminobod. He was born in 1977 into a family of farmers. His parents were involved in animal husbandry and farming in the district. They worked in agriculture and earned a living. Khurshed began walking in his parents' footsteps five years ago. He decided to advance their business and retain the source of income. Khurshed is currently involved in horse husbandry. He has a horse stable. He also raises other livestock. His wife is involved in farming and supports her husband. Khurshed wants to increase the number of his horses. He needs some money to accomplish this and requested this loan. Khurshed hopes for Your support.

loans.use: to buy a horse in order to increase his livestock headcount

loans.name: Renacer De Hoy Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “RENACER DE HOY” iniciará el cuarto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal German Busch, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Vicenta es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de empanadas, venta de ropa, venta de sillones, venta de papas y plátano frito, venta de comida, venta de cortinas, venta de chompas.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Vicenta es integrante, ella indica que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una promoción de la institución que se realizo en su zona. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de comida; da a conocer que este negocio lo emprendió por iniciativa propia hace diez años.

 El crédito que ahora sacará será para el aumento de capital (compra de arroz y papa por quintal) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la ciudad de El Alto y posteriormente a la elaboración, lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella vive en unión libre y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud  y las capacitaciones que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The “Renacer Hoy” [Reborn Today] communal bank will start its fourth loan cycle with Pro Mujer, as a part of the German Busch administrative offices. The communal bank is made up of eight members and is guided by a group of directors, of which Vicenta is the president. The businesses that the members of the bank have are varied, and among them are: empanada sales, clothing sales, selling chairs, selling potatoes and fried plantains, food sales, curtain sales, and selling coats.

The loan they take out will benefit the small entrepreneurs where Vicenta is a member. She explains that she joined with Pro Mujer by invitation via a promotion that the institution did in her neighborhood. She currently has a business that sells foods. She explains that she started this business due to her own self initiative ten years ago.

The loan she will take will be used to buy rice and potatoes by the sack, which she will purchase from the whole salers in the city of El Alto. After making the food, she will sell it from her market stall. This kind of work allows her to generate income so she can economically support her family. She lives in a common-law marriage and has three children.

When asked, she explains that she likes Pro Mujer. She responds that she likes the healthcare and the trainings that the institution offers.

loans.use: to buy rice and potatoes by the sack.

loans.name: Wilber Jose

texts.es:
