Wilber es un hombre sonriente y carismático el cual inició un negocio de tienda de productos de la canasta familiar (típica tienda de barrio), actividad que nació de la necesidad económica, necesita dinero para mantener su hogar, donde lo espera su pareja con quien vive en unión libre, al igual que ayuda en todo lo que puede a su madre, por ello mantener el negocio se ha convertido en una prioridad para el empresario. WIlber solicita un préstamo para comprar surtido de abarrotes, víveres, granos, refrescos, productos lácteos, snacks, cervezas para abastecer su tienda y poder atender la demanda que se presenta en fin de año.
Con la inversión lo que espera lograr es aumentar sus ingresos y así invertir en su tienda, aumentar su inventario, mejorar en infraestructura y tener nuevas línea de venta como frutas y verduras.
texts.en:
Wilber is a smiling and charismatic person. He started a small grocery store business (a typical type of store in his neighborhood), which came about due to economic necessity. He needs money to support his house, where he lives in a common-law marriage with his partner. He also helps out his mother as much as possible. For these reasons, maintaining his business has become a priority for this business owner. Wilber is requesting a loan to buy grocery items, grains, soft drinks, dairy products, snacks, and beers in order to stock his store and tend to the requests that are made during the holidays.

With the investment, he hopes to increase his income and invest in his store by augmenting his inventory, improving his infrastructure, and having new things to sells, such as fruits and vegetables.

loans.use: to buy grocery items, grains, soft drinks, dairy products, snacks, and beers in order to stock his store

loans.name: Jose Antonio

texts.es:
José es un hombre de 55 años de edad casado y con una hermosa hija de 10 años de edad, se dedica al cultivo de flores, actividad que ha realizado gran parte de su vida, primero como empleado y lleva como empresario independiente aproximadamente 20 años.
José tiene en mente cultivar un mayor número de flores y está es la temporada ideal para hacerlo, el principal impedimento que tiene es la falta de recursos para comprar los insumos agrícolas, pero si logra cultivar mayor número de flores sus ingresos aumentarán dado que tiene los clientes para venderle.
Es por esto que con mucho entusiasmo y grandes expectativas, el cliente solicita un préstamo para comprar semillas, abonos y riegos con los cuales plantara un nuevo terreno de flores, sueña con tener éxito, que la cosecha sea todo un éxito y seguir manteniendo a su familia por muchos años más.
texts.en:
José is a 55-year-old man. He is married and has a beautiful daughter who is ten years old. José grows flowers, work he has done for most of his life, first as a worker and, for the past twenty years, as his own boss.
José has decided to grow a larger number of flowers, since this is the ideal season for doing so. The greatest impediment he faces is a lack of resources to purchase agricultural supplies, but if he is able to grow a greater quantity of flowers his earnings will increase since he already has the customers to buy them.
For this reason, and with great enthusiasm and high expectations, José requests a loan to purchase seeds, fertilizers and irrigation with which he will plant a new crop of flowers. He hopes to have success and that his harvest is successful and also to continue supporting his family for many years to come.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizers and irrigation for a new flower crop.

loans.name: Olambi

texts.ru: Оламби молодая мама и жена, скоро надеется стать счастливой свекровью. Оламби повар. Она готовит для больших мероприятий. Поклонников ее блюд очень много и постоянно ее приглашают готовить на разные праздники. На свадьбе сына Оламби сама планирует готовить. Свадьба состоится скоро. Свадьба в Таджикистане проходит масштабно, и количество гостей доходит до 100-150, и конечно это затратное мероприятие и Оламби для этого просит кредит. Оламби приглашает Вас на свадьбу и будет рада видеть каждого.
texts.en: Olambi is a young mother and wife and hopes to become a happy mother-in-law soon. Olambi is a cook. She cooks for large events. There are many devotees of her dishes, and she is always invited to cook for various celebrations. Olambi is planning to prepare food for her son's wedding herself. The wedding will be taking place soon. A wedding in Tajikistan is a large event with as many as 100-150 guests, and, of course, costly, and Olambi is requesting the loan for this purpose. Olambi invites You to the wedding as well and will be happy to see everyone there.

loans.use: to hold her son's wedding

loans.name: Valijon

texts.ru: Валичон в возрасте 22. Он женат. Валичон уроженец Шахритузкого района. Уже 6 лет как Валичон выращивает зерновые культуры. Его работа позволяет ему улучшить уровень жизни его семьи. Валичон хочет посадить пшеницу, и другие овощи на своем земельном участке. И с этой целью он обратился за  кредитом, чтобы купить семена и минеральные удобрения. Он надеется, получить хороший урожай после шести месяцев и откладывать сбережения на будущее своей семьи. Валичон очень надеется на Вашу поддержку.
texts.en: Valijon is 22 years old and married. Valijon is a native of the Shahrituz district. Valijon has been growing cereal grains for 6 years. His work allows him to improve his family's quality of life. Valijon wants to plant wheat and other vegetables on his land plot. He requested this loan to accomplish this goal and buy seeds and mineral fertilizers. He hopes to gather a good harvest in six months and save money for his family's future. Valijon truly hopes for Your support.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and mineral fertilizers in order to plant wheat

loans.name: Thérésia

texts.fr: Veuve et mère de cinq enfants, Thérésia est une femme âgée de 50 ans résidant à Tokoin. Thérésia est une marchande de produits d’alimentations générales qui s’approvisionne de ses marchandises trois fois par mois au marché et le revend sous un hangar à la devanture de son domicile. Thérésia sollicite ce prêt pour commander des sacs de sucre, des cartons de spaghettis, des sachets de paquets détergents et de bonbons en vue de stocker une plus grande quantité de marchandises puis maximiser son profit afin d’aider ses enfants dans leur éducation scolaire et à prendre en charge certaines dépenses quotidiennes.
texts.en:
A widow with five children, Thérésia is a 50-year-old woman who lives in Tokoin. Thérésia sells groceries. She buys her supplies three times a month and sells them in a shed in front of her home.

Thérésia is asking for this loan so that she can order bags of sugar, boxes of spaghetti, packets of detergent, and candy with the goal of increasing her stock. She wants to maximize her profits so that she can help her children with their education and be responsible for her daily expenses.

loans.use: buy two bags of sugar, four boxes of spaghetti, five packets of detergent, and two bags of candy.

loans.name: Darlan Alejandro

texts.es:
Darlan es un joven estudiante que vive junto a sus padres y 3 hermanos. Cuando terminó la secundaria, tuvo que trabajar para apoyar en los gastos del hogar y así sus padres puedan reunir el dinero para poder prepararse para ingresar a SENATI. En el año 2013 tuvo problemas de pago, por lo que tuvo que reservar su matrícula hasta recibir el reunir la cantidad necesaria de dinero que le permita retomar sus estudios. Debido a esos problemas de pago, enfermó.

Al lograr reunir el dinero, retomó sus estudios, pero lo hizo en el turno noche para poder trabajar durante el día y seguir apoyando a su familia. A pesar del obstáculo principal que tiene en su familia, el dinero, él no deja de estudiar porque quiere lograrse profesionalmente.

Lleva dos años estudiando, a pesar de haber reservado su matrícula en dos ocasiones por falta de dinero. Aún le faltan dos años más para acabar su carrera. Actualmente, le dedica a sus estudios 30 horas semanales. Cuando acabe su carrera le gustaría trabajar por un tiempo en empresas mineras que le brinden mayor experiencia sobre su carrera.

Debido a la difícil situación económica por la que atraviesa su familia, Darlan recurre a KIVA para que le puedan brindar el apoyo que necesita y así no tenga que dejar de estudiar nuevamente, logrando acabar su carrera en el tiempo estimado. Este crédito lo utilizará para pagar las cuotas mensuales de su carrera, con lo cual podrá aliviar un poco los gastos familiares de sus padres.

Darlan tiene varios sueños en la vida, pero el mayor sueño sería el poder ayudar a los demás, tomando a KIVA como ejemplo, apoyando así a jóvenes soñadores como él que buscan su desarrollo profesional y ser exitosos en la vida.

Para Darlan, es una sensación agradable saber que gracias al apoyo de personas de diferentes partes del mundo, él podrá acabar su carrera. Por eso, Darlan, quiere expresarles unas líneas a los inversionistas de KIVA: "Estoy muy agradecido con ustedes por darme esta oportunidad, muchas gracias y les deseo de todo corazón muchos éxitos a todos ustedes. No los defraudaré, ya lo verán!".
texts.en:
Darlan is a young student who lives with his parents and 3 brothers. When he finished high-school he had to work to contribute to the household expenses so that his parents could gather the money to prepare for entering SENATI (National Industrial Work Training Service).

In the year 2013 he had payment problems. That´s why he had to suspend his enrolment until getting the necessary amount of money gathered, which would allow him to resume his studies. Due to this payment problems, he became ill.

When he managed to gather the money, he resumed his studies, but he did it during the evening turns, so that he could work during the day and continue supporting his family.
Despite his family´s main obstacle, the money, he doesn´t quit his studies because he wants to advance professionally.

He is studying for two years, even though he had to suspend his enrolment two times for the lack of money. He still needs two more years to finish his degree. Currently he dedicates 30 hours a week to his studies. When he finishes his degree he would like to work for a while in mining companies who provide more experience in his faculty.

Due to the difficult economic situation that his family is goint through, Darlan appeals to KIVA to provide him the support he needs and that in this way he doesn´t have to quit his studies again and can manage to finish his degree in the estimated time. He will use this loan to pay for the monthly fees for his degree with which he will be able to alleviate the family expenses of his parents a bit.

Darlan has different dreams in his life, but the biggest dream would be to be able to help others, taking KIVA as example, thus to support young dreamers like himself who are striving to develop professionally and to be successful in life.

For Darlan it´s a good feeling, knowing that thanks to the support of people from different parts of the world, he will be able to finish his degree. For this reason Darlan wishes to write down some lines to the KIVA-investors: "I´m very grateful to you for giving me this opportunity. Thank you very much and I wish a lot of success to all of you from the bottom of my heart. I will not disappoint you, you will see!"

loans.use: to continue his studies in Mechanical Technical Drawing.

loans.name: Mahbuba

texts.ru:
С этой девушкой жизнь точно не пройдет скучно. Ее зовут Махбуба. Ей 24 года. Она замужем и имеет двоих детей. Общаясь с ней, понимаешь, как же ее мужу повезло жениться на такой прекрасной девушке. Она вкусно готовит, держит дом в порядке и к тому же работает на скотном дворе. Ее муж работает строителем.
   Махбуба уже 7 лет продвигает животноводческую деятельность. Это хороший бизнес, приносящий в дом не много но достаточный доход. К тому же ее дети всегда пьют свежее молоко. Махбуба заботиться о здоровее детей. Она хочет получить кредит и купить еще несколько телят. Этот кредит будет одним из важных шагов, чтобы изменить жизнь ее семьи в лучшую сторону.
texts.en:
Life surely will not be boring with this young woman. Her name is Mahbuba and she is 24 years old. She is married and has two children. By interacting with her, it is easy to understand how lucky her husband is to have married this wonderful young woman. She cooks delicious meals, keeps the house in order and also works at a livestock yard. Her husband is a construction worker.

Mahbuba has been running an animal husbandry business for 7 years. This is a good business, yielding not a lot, but enough money home. In addition, her children always drink fresh milk. Mahbuba cares about her children's health. She wants to obtain this loan and buy more calves. This loan will be one of the very important decisions to turn her family's around for the better.

loans.use: to buy additional calves

loans.name: Akouavi

texts.fr: Divorcée, Akouvi est une femme qui vit avec deux enfants à charge. Akouvi est âgée de 55 ans et réside à Tokoin où elle vend  des produits alimentaires et du charbon de bois. Akouvi s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché et le revend sous un hangar à la devanture de son domicile. Akouvi sollicite ce crédit pour commander des bols de farine de manioc et des sacs de charbon de bois en vue de mieux revendre puis gagner des bénéfices et pouvoir subvenir aux besoins de sa famille et améliorer ses conditions de vie quotidiennes.
texts.en:
Akouvi is divorced and lives with her two dependent children. She is 55 and lives in Tokoin where she sells groceries and charcoal. She buys her supplies two times a month in the market. She sells out of a shed in front of her home.

She is asking for a loan so that she can order cassava flour and bags of charcoal. This will help her earn more, meet the needs of her family, and improve her family's life conditions.

loans.use: buy 40 bowls of cassava flour and six bags of charcoal.

loans.name: Sanovbar

texts.ru: Санобар 68 лет. Она вдова. Сановбар живет с сыном в маленьком районе Хуросон. Сановбар занимается выращиванием скотин. У нее есть все условия для данного бизнеса, в том числе и опыт. Сановбар хочет расширить бизнес. Она собирается увеличить поголовья скотин и поэтому просит кредит. Благодаря кредиту Санавбар увеличить количество скот и станет чуть более счастливой.
texts.en: Sanovbar is 68 years old. She is a widow and lives with her son in a small district of Khuroson. Sanovbar is involved in raising livestock. She has all the necessary conditions for this business, including experience. Sanovbar wants to expand her business. She is planning to increase her livestock headcount and requesting a loan for this purpose. Thanks to this loan, Sanovbar will increase her livestock headcount and become a little more happy.

loans.use: to increase her livestock headcount

loans.name: Charlotte

texts.fr: Mère de quatre enfants, Charlotte est une femme mariée âgée de 37 ans résidant à Tokoin. Charlotte est une marchande de produits alimentaires qui s’approvisionne deux fois par mois au marché et le revend aussi là pour gagner ses revenus. Charlotte désire ce prêt pour commander des bidons d’huile végétale, rouge et de carton de tomates en boîte. Avec le résultat positif gagné, Charlotte va pouvoir aider son mari dans les charges de la famille et permettre une bonne éducation scolaire à ses enfants.
texts.en:
Charlotte is thirty-seven years old, married and mother to four children. She lives in Tokoin and sells food products. She buys her stock twice a month from the market and resells it there too.

Charlotte has requested this loan to buy drums of vegetable oil and red oil, and boxes of tinned tomatoes. She will use her profits to help her husband provide for the expenses of their family and pay for a good education for her children.

loans.use: to buy 4 drums of vegetable oil, 1 drum of red oil and 1 box of tinned tomatoes.

loans.name: Rabiya

texts.ru: Рабия проживает в районе Хуросон. Ей 50 лет. Она замужем и имеет 4 детей. Рабия любит животных, и поэтому она занимается животноводством. Она занимается выращиванием скота 13 лет. Рабия покупает молодых телят и откармливает их в течение определенного времени и перепродает их на скотном рынке.  Она научилась у родителей. Ей в работе помогает муж. Рабия  обратилась за кредитом, чтобы расширить деятельность. Рабия за счет денег купить несколько молодых телят. С помощью этого кредита она может продвигаться дальше и улучшить условий жизни семьи.
texts.en: Rabiya lives in the Khuroson district. She is 50 years old, married and has 4 children. Rabiya loves animals and, hence, is involved in animal hsbandry. She has been involved in raising livestock for 13 years. Rabiya buys young calves, fattens them up for a set period of time and then resells them at a livestock market. She learned this trade from her parents. Her husband helps her with the work. Rabiya requested this loan to expand her business. Rabiya will use this money to buy several young calves. With the help of this loan, she can advance further and improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy young calves in order to expand her business

loans.name: Afi  Laure

texts.fr: Afi est une veuve femme  âgée de 34 ans qui habite à Tokoin. Mère de deux enfants, Afi est une revendeuse de fruits qui s’approvisionne une fois par mois au marché. Afi revend ses marchandises à domicile et en parcourant les quartiers environnant. Afi demande ce crédit pour commander des bananes plantains, des oranges et des ananas en vue de gagner des bénéfices et maximiser son profit et favoriser l’éducation scolaire de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Afi is thirty-four years old, widowed and mother to two children. She lives in Tokoin and sells fruit. She buys her stock once a month from the market and sells it from her home and on foot in the surrounding districts.

Afi has requested this loan to buy plantains, oranges and pineapples. She will use her profits to provide for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy 4 loads of plantains, 4 sacks of oranges and 2 sacks of pineapples.

loans.name: Amélé Lili

texts.fr: Amélé est une femme mariée âgée de 44 ans qui vit avec deux enfants à charge. Amélé est une revendeuse des crevettes séchées ou fumées résidante à Tokoin. Amélé achète ses marchandises deux fois par mois au marché et le revend sous un hangar à la devanture de son domicile. Amélé sollicite ce prêt pour commander des sacs de crevettes sèches en vue de bien revendre et avoir un bénéfice pour aider son mari à organiser l’éducation scolaire de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Amélé is forty-four years old, married and lives with two children in her care. She lives in Tokoin and sells dried and smoked shrimps. She buys her supplies twice a month from the market and resells them from a stall in front of her home.

Amélé has requested this loan to buy sacks of dried shrimps for sale. She will use her profits to help her husband provide for the education of their children.

loans.use: to buy 4 sacks of shrimps.

loans.name: Abiba

texts.fr: Abiba est une femme mariée âgée de 43 ans résidante à Tokoin. Mère de deux enfants, Abiba est une revendeuse de produits alimentaires qui s’approvisionne quatre fois par mois au marché et le revend sous un hangar à la devanture de son domicile. Abiba désire ce prêt pour commander des sacs de riz et des bidons d’huile. Avec la marge bénéficiaire qui en résultera suite à une bonne revente, Abiba compte améliorer sa prestation de vente et aider sa famille à avoir un bon épanouissement et une bonne éducation scolaire à ses enfants.
texts.en:
Abiba is forty-three years old, married and mother to two children. She lives in Tokoin and sells food products. She buys her stock four times a month from the market and resells it from a stall in front of her home.

Abiba has requested this loan to buy sacks of rice and drums of vegetable oil. She will use her profits to improve the range of products she offers for sale, improve the living standards of her family and pay for a good education for her children.

loans.use: to buy 2 sacks of rice and 2 drums of oil.

loans.name: Ablavi

texts.fr: Ablavi est une femme mariée âgée de 33 ans résidante à Tokoin. Avec quatre enfants à charge, Ablavi est une marchande de fruits qu’elle achète et revend en parcourant les quartiers environnant. Ablavi s’approvisionne de ses marchandises huit fois par mois  au marché et désire ce prêt pour commander des sacs de bananes et d’oranges. Avec la marge bénéficiaire qui en résultera suite à une bonne vente, Ablavi compte améliorer sa prestation de vente et pouvoir subvenir à ses besoins quotidiens puis supporter ses enfants et à leur épanouissement.
texts.en:
Ablavi is thirty-three years old, married and has four children in her care. She lives in Tokoin and sells fruit. She buys her stock eight times a month from the market and resells it on foot in neighbouring districts.

Ablavi has requested this loan to buy sacks of bananas and oranges. She will use her profits to improve the range of fruit she offers for sale and improve the living standards of her family.

loans.use: to buy 1 quantity of bananas and 2 quantities of oranges.

loans.name: Gulnora

texts.ru: Гулнора 38 летняя талантливая ткачиха живет в районе Восеъ Хатлонской области. Занимается она плетением 7 лет. Гулнора живет вместе с сыном и дочкой. Ремеслу ткачихе научилась у своей матери и сейчас этим зарабатывает  на жизнь.  Она выдумает ткать  красивые и качественные изделия, соответствующие вкусу потребителей и заказчиков. Гулнора хочет расширить деятельность и увеличить доход. Она просит кредит для купли вязание необходимое средство.
texts.en: Gulnora is a 38-year-old talented seamstress, living in the Vose district of the Khalton province. She has been involved in weaving for 7 years. Gulnora lives with her son and daughter. She learned the seamstress trade from her mother and now earns a living with it. She creates beautiful and quality goods, fitted to the taste of her consumers and distributors. Gulnora wants to expand her business and increase her income. She is requesting this loan to buy necessary supplies for her knitting business.

loans.use: to buy necessary knitting supplies and expand her business

loans.name: Gerber Javier

texts.es:
Gerber 26 años de edad, está soltero, vive en la comunidad con su abuela pues fue ella quien lo creció desde pequeño y fue quien le apoyó para que lograra estudiar bachillerato, de él depende su abuela a quien siempre apoya, se acompañó hace un años y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos y otros trabajos varios.


Gerber se dedica a los trabajos en el campo, gracias a su abuela quien fue que le motivó a trabajar arduamente en la siembra de maíz, frijoles, y maicillo, aprendió desde que tenia diez años cuando lo llevaban al campo. Ahora el tiene cultivado una hectárea de maíz y una de frijoles, trabaja todos los días desde las 7:00 am hasta el mediodía, también va ha trabajar a proyectos que realiza la alcaldía de su pueblo. 

Él necesita el crédito para pagar a la mano de obra que le ayudará a sacar la cosecha y pagar el alquiler del terreno donde cultiva.


Él sueña con hacer su propia casa donde poder vivir con la familia en especial su abuela para darle así una mejor calidad de vida. Además dentro de sus planes esta estudiar los  fines de semana en la universidad para poder continuar sus estudios y superarse académicamente y dar lo mejor a la familia y la sociedad.
texts.en:
Gerber is 26-years old. He is single and lives in a community with his grandmother because it was she who raised him from a young boy and was who supported him so that he managed to go to high school. His grandmother depends on him and he always supports her. He got married a few years ago and his wife works in domestic chores and other various jobs. Gerber works in the field thanks to his grandmother who motivated him to work hard growing corn, beans and sorghum. He learned when he was 10-years old and they took him to the field.

Now he has a cultivated hectare of corn and one of beans. He works every day from 7AM to midday. He also goes to work on projects carried out by the mayor of his village. He needs the loan to pay labor that will help to remove the crops and pay the rent of the land where he grows. He dreams of building his own house where he can live with his family, especially his grandmother to give her a better quality of life. Also within his plans are to study on the weekends in the university to be able to continue his studies and succeed academically and give his best to his family and society.

loans.use: to pay labor that will help to remove the crops and pay the rent of the land where he grows.

loans.name: Zarrina

texts.ru:
Заррине обращается за кредитом для покупки стройматериалов и ремонта дома. Ей 32 года. Она замужем и имеет двоих детей. У нее мужа нет определенного места работы, и он работает временно на разных местах. Заррина понимает мужа, и поддерживает его, не смотря ни на что. Сама Заррина дома предоставляет услуги портнихи. 
  Скоро зима и Заррина хочет отремонтировать дом, и подготовится к зиме. Она понимает, как важно сохранить тепло в доме и чтобы дети не пострадали от холода. Заррина собирается купить стройматериалы и отремонтировать дом.
texts.en:
Zarrina is requesting this loan to buy construction materials and repair her house. She is 32 years old. She is married and has two children. Her husband does not have a set place of employment and temporarily works at various places. Zarrina understands her husband and supports him, despite everything. Zarrina provides seamstress services at home.

Winter is coming soon, and Zarrina wants to repair her house and prepare for the winter. She understands how important it is to retain heat in the house and to ensure that her children do not suffer from the cold. Zarrina is planning to buy construction materials and repair her house.

loans.use: to buy construction materials and repair her house

loans.name: Juana Yaneth

texts.es: Juana es una valerosa mujer de 41 años que reside en una humilde vivienda ubicada en un popular barrio de Barranquilla, ella es mujer cabeza de hogar y madre responsable de cuatro hijos de los cuales, dos aún son menores de edad y al encontrarse separada de su pareja sentimental encontró en el comercio de mercancías una alternativa de generar ingresos para el sustento de su grupo familiar. Una hermana le suministró algunos artículos de su negocio para que ella iniciara el suyo y  a las afueras de un colegio empezó a exhibirles a las estudiantes diademas, ganchos y hebillas para el cabello.  Posteriormente con sus ganancias y más aportes de capital amplió su oferta de productos y con ello su base de clientes y les ofreció a familiares, amigos y conocidos artículos para el hogar y joyas.  Juana cuenta con diez años de experiencia en esta actividad y realizó una solicitud de crédito, un credikiva, oportunidad para vincularse a la vida financiera a través de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo para comprar joyas, alcobas y comedores que le han solicitado sus clientes. Juana a futuro desea adecuar un local en su vivienda y continuar velando porque sus hijos progresen.
texts.en:
Juana is a courageous 41-year-old woman who lives in a humble house located in a popular neighborhood of Barranquilla. She is the head of her household and a responsible mother of four children, two of whom are minors.

After she found herself separated from her partner, she found an alternative income in the merchandise business to help the livelihood of her family. A sister provided her with some items from her own business so that she [Juana] could start her own, and she began to display her wares outside of a school, selling headbands, hairbands and hair clips to the students.

After she earned some money and gained some capital contributions, she extended her product offerings, and thereby her customer base, selling jewelry and items for the home to family, friends and acquaintances. 

Juana has 10 years of experience in this work, and has made this credit application (credKiva) for an opportunity to link her finances with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo so that she can buy jewelry, bedroom furniture and dining room sets that her customers now demand. 

In the future, Juana wishes to adapt a room in her house and to continue [selling] so that her children can progress.

loans.use: to buy jewelry, bedroom furniture and dining room sets

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase vegetables, fruits, chicken and bread, in order to increase inventory and to sell more at this year's end.

loans.name: Gul'chehra

texts.en: Gul'chehra is 45 years old. She has one son who is her only child. She lives in the Jomi district with her father-in-law, her husband, and her 20-year-old son. Her son is currently working abroad, where he has decided to build his career. Her husband works in agriculture. Gul'chehra herself raises livestock, an activity she's been involved in for the past 15 years. She enjoys taking care of farm animals and she is planning to get more sheep in the future. Gul'chehra has requested this loan to pay for her father-in-law's medical treatment. He is very ill and his condition is quite serious. He needs to have a surgery. Gul'chehra and her husband are doing all they can to help him; they have actually spent all their money on medications and have nothing left. For this reason, Gul'chehra is turning to you for a loan. She really hopes to get this loan. Please support her. Gul'chehra will be very grateful for your support.

loans.use: to buy medications and pay for her father-in-law's surgery.

loans.name: Farishtamo

texts.ru: Фариштамо в переводе озночает ангел с луны. Действительно эта молодая, скромная 29 летняя девушка 5 лет занимается бизнесом в городе Курнаг-Тюбе. К сожалению Фариштамо в разводе. У нее есть 3-х летняя дочка. Живет Фариштамо со своими родителями и младшими братьями. Чтобы не быть обузой для своей семьи Фариштамо торгует на местном рынке. Она давно мечтала открыть свой маленький бизнес. У Фариштамо сейчас есть большая возможность с помощью кредита открыть свой бизнес. Она хочет купить продукты питания на продажу. Однако для открытия  бизнеса ей необходимо финансовая помощь. Она обращается к Вам с полной надеждой на ваше понимание.
texts.en: The name Farishtamo means "angel from the moon".  This young and modest 29-year-old woman has been involved in small retail business in the city of Qurgantube for the past five years.  Unfortunately she is divorced.  She has a three-year-old little girl.  She lives with her own parents and younger brothers.  In order not to be a burden for her family, she works as a vendor at the local market.  She has been dreaming about opening her own business for a long time.  At the moment, Farishtamo has a great opportunity to open her own business with the help of a loan.  However, she cannot start her business without financial help.  She is turning to you with great hopes and thanks you for your understanding.

loans.use: to purchase food products for resale.

loans.name: Qurbonbi

texts.ru: Курбонби 63 года. Она замужем за тракториста. Курбонби занимается животноводством настолько давно, что уже не помнит. У нее всегда в доме были скоты, ведь за счет них они жили. Курбонби имеет на сегодняшний день всего скота и хочет купить одну корову, но денег не хватает. Курбонби решила обратиться за кредитом и верит, что ее поддержат в выборе.
texts.en:
Qurbonbi is 63 years old. She is married to a tractor driver. Qurbonbi has worked in animal husbandry for so long that she does not remember when she started. She has always had livestock at home, since she and her family have lived thanks to them.

Qurbonbi has only livestock today and she wants to buy a cow, but she does not have enough money. Qurbonbi has decided to apply for a loan and believes that she will be supported in her decision.

loans.use: to buy one cow

loans.name: Mahmudjon

texts.ru: Махмудчону 53 лет. Он семейный мужчина. У него два сына. Сыновьям 19 и 25 лет. Старший сын находится на заработках в Российской Федерации. Он молодой бизнесмен, и помогает папе обеспечить семью. Младший сын живет вместе с родителем. Махмудчон любитель автомашин, он с детства мечтал стать хорошим водителем. Махмудчон научился водить автомашину в автошколе. Сейчас он имеет больше опыта. Махмудчон планирует купить себе автомашину и заниматься таксистом. Он свой город хорошо знает, ему не будет тяжело перевозить людей. У Махмудчона не хватает денег для купли автомашин. Из-за нехватки он обратился за кредитом. Ваша поддержка поможет ему приобрести автомашин и имеет постоянную работу.
texts.en:
Mahmudjon is 53 years old. He is a family-oriented man. He has two sons. His sons are 19 and 25 years old. His older son works in Russia. His younger son is a businessman, and helps his father to provide for the family. His younger son lives with his parents. Mahmudjon loves cars, and he has dreamt of becoming a good driver since childhood. Mahmudjon has learned to drive a car in driving school. Now he has more experience. 

Mahmudjon plans to buy himself a car and work as a taxi driver. He knows his city very well, and it will not be difficult for him to transport people. Mahmudjon does not have enough money to buy a car. Because of this insufficiency of funds, he has applied for a loan. Your support will help him to purchase a car and have a permanent job.

loans.use: to buy a car

loans.name: Shahnoza

texts.ru: Шахноза из Яванского района, 21 летняя молодая замужняя девушка.  Но, не смотря на свой молодой возраст, добилась хорошей репутации портнихи. Все девушки ее села обращаются к ней за пошивом национальных платьев.  Муж Шахнозы является таксистом. Шахноза очень любит свою профессию, однако в последнее время ее швейная машинка не работает в полной мере. С этой целью она обратилась к Вам за кредитом, чтобы купить новую швейную машинку. Таким образом, она хочет улучшить качество своих услуг.
texts.en: Shahnoza is from the Yavan district.  She is a young 21-year-old married woman.  In spite of her young age, she has acquired a good reputation as a dressmaker.  All the young women of her village turn to her when they need to have a traditional dress made.  Shahnoza's husband works as a taxi driver.  Shahnoza loves her work. Unfortunately, her sewing machine hasn't been working well lately.  For this reason, she is turning to you for a loan that will help her buy a new sewing machine.  Thanks to this loan, she is hoping to improve the quality of her sewing service.

loans.use: to purchase a new sewing machine.

loans.name: Muhamadi

texts.ru: Жительница города Курган-Тюбе Мухамади искусный повар в своем районе. Ей 63 года и у нее большая семья. Муж Мухамади вместе со старшим сыном находятся в трудовой миграции в России. Чтобы обеспечивать семью всем необходимым Мухамади работает в местной столовой поваром.  Мухамади хочет дома заняться кулинарией и для этого ей необходима купит духовку и продукты для выпечки. Именно с этой целью Мухамади обратилась в программу Кива чтобы получить кредит и начать свое дело. Она просит ее поддержать.
texts.en: Muhamadi lives in the Qurgan-Tube region. She is a skilled cook. She is 63 years old and has a large family. Her husband and eldest son are currently in Russia as migrant workers. In order to support her family, Muhamadi works as a cook in a local cafeteria. She would like to start cooking food for sale at home. For this she needs an oven and ingredients for baking. With this goal in mind, Muhamadi has applied to Kiva to obtain a loan and launch her business. She is asking for your support.

loans.use: to buy an oven and baking ingredients.

loans.name: Shafoat

texts.ru: Шафоат 45 лет. Она из города Худжанд. Шафоат в городе живет вместе мужем и сыном. У нее дружная и жизнелюбивая семья. Ее муж работает в магазине. Он продает продукт питания. Сын Шафоат занимается таксистом в городе. Сама Шафоат занимается один видом бизнесом. Она продает фрукты. У нее свежее фрукты. Шафоат перевезет качественные и свежее фрукты. Поэтому у нее имеется больше клиентов. Шафоату нравится заниматься торговлей деятельности, и общаться с клиентами. Она хочет перевозить свежее фрукты и увеличить товарооборот. Для перевоза фрукты ей нужно денежных средств. Шафоат с этой целью запрашивает кредит.
texts.en:
Shafoat is 45 years old. She is from Khujand city. Shafoat lives with her husband and son in the city. She has an amiable family full of joie de vivre. Her husband works in a shop. He sells food products. Shafoat's son works as a taxi driver in the city. Shafoat herself runs a business. She sells fruits. She has fresh fruits. Shafoat brings in good quality and fresh fruits. Thus she has more clients. 

Shafoat likes working in the retail business, and communicating with her clients. She wants to bring in fresh fruits and increase her turnover. She needs funds for transporting the fruits. Shafoat is requesting a loan with this goal in mind.

loans.use: to transport fruits and increase her turnover

loans.name: Dora Elizabeth

texts.es: Dora es una mujer trabajadora de 27 años de edad que se dedica a la venta de productos varios en su vivienda, actividad que realiza desde hace mucho tiempo. Ella habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de 5 y 2 años de edad, a los que siempre trata de brindar lo mejor. Dora desea invertir en mayor cantidad de productos, ya que actualmente su negocio es compartido con su hermana y ambas quieren tener su propio negocio, por lo que ella solicita un crédito a FUSAI para invertir en: productos plásticos, de limpieza, medicamentos, higiene personal entre otros productos.
texts.en:
Dora is a very hardworking 27 year old woman who make a living selling various products from her home. She has performed this trade for a long time. She lives in her own house together with her life partner and her two children, aged 5 and 2 years old. She always tries to provide them with the best.

Dora wants to invest in more products. Currently, her business is shared with her sister and both want to have her own business. So she is requesting a loan from FUSAI to invest in plastic products, cleaning supplies, medicines, and personal hygiene products, among others.

loans.use: to invest in plastic, cleaning, medicine, personal hygiene, and other products.

loans.name: Qurbongul

texts.ru:
Курбонгулу 52 года. Она имеет двое детей, двое невесток и двое внуков. Ее дети уехали на заработки в Россию, а их дети и жены живут с Курбонгул. 
  Курбонгул в течение 5 лет продвигает животноводческую деятельность. Большую часть денег приносится в семейный бюджет именно этот бизнес. Она решила расширить свой бизнес путем увеличения поголовья скотин. Для этого она прости кредит. С помощью кредита она сможет купить телят, позже увеличится производство молока и тогда Курбонгул сможет продавать молоко и увеличить доход.
texts.en:
Qurbongul is 52 and has two children, two daughters-in-law and two grandchildren. Her children both work in Russia and their children and wives live with Qurbongul.

For the past five years she has been running a business in animal husbandry, from which comes the majority of her household income. She has decided to expand this business by increasing her head count of livestock. For this reason she is looking for a loan. With the help of this loan she will be able to buy calves, and eventually to increase her production of milk so she can sell the milk and increase her income.

loans.use: to increase her head count of livestock

loans.name: Jamshed

texts.ru: Молодой, активный и веселый парень Чамшед. Ему 28 лет. Он женат и имеет 2 детишек. Чамшед в городе Турсунзаде живет вместе с отцом, матерью, братом, женой и детьми. Его один брат находится на заработках в Российской Федерации.  Младший брат занимается электриком в городе. Сам Чамшед работает инженером в компании «T-cell». В этой сфере работе он работает более 3 года. Чамшед обратился за кредитом с целью для операции отца. Его отец серьезно болеет. Чамшед и его братья много старается вылечить отца, и они много тратили на купли лекарство и на лечения. Сейчас отцу надо сделать операцию, по причине, что у него с лечением не получается его вылечить. Для операции требуется много определенная сумма денег. Чамшед и его браться тратили свои все деньги. Чамшед очень был расстроен, что у них нет денег для операции, и Чамшед решил обратиться к Вам за кредитом. Чамшеду нужна Ваша поддержка. Вы можете помочь семью Чамшеда.
texts.en:
This young, active, and cheerful man is Jamshed. He is 28 years old. He is married and has two young children. Jamshed lives with his father, mother, brother, wife, and children in Tursun-zoda city. One of his brothers works in Russia. His younger brother works as an electrician in the city. Jamshed works as an engineer in 'T-cell' company. He has worked in this sphere of work for more than three years. 

Jamshed has applied for a loan with the goal of paying for his father's operation. His father is very ill. Jamshed and his brothers are trying hard to cure their father, and they have spent a lot on buying medicines for treatment. Now his father needs to have an operation, because he cannot be cured with just treatment. A lot of money is needed for the operation, and Jamshed has decided to appeal to you for a loan. Jamshed needs your support. You can help Jamshed's family.

loans.use: to pay for his father's operation

loans.name: Dalerjon

texts.ru:
Далерчон молодой парень в возрасте 24 лет. Он еще не женат и живет с родителями. Далерчон живёт со своей семьёй в сельской местности. Он водитель такси. На собственной машине, Далерчон развозит клиентов и таким образом зарабатывает  на жизнь. У Далерчона есть постоянные клиенты, которые довольны его работой и постоянно заказывают его такси. Далерчон  от этого дело получает хороший и стабильный доход. Спрос на его труд есть в разное время года. 
В данный момент его машина сломалась и  Далерчон  хочет отремонтировать свою машину. Но у него не хватает собственных средств. Он обратился в Арванд за кредитом. 
Далерчон заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку и надеется на положительный результат.
texts.en:
Dalerjon is a young man.  He is 24 years old, unmarried and lives with his parents in a rural area.  He works as a taxi driver.  He uses his own car to drive people around and earns his living in this way.  Dalerjon has regular clients who are happy with his services and always hire his taxi.  Dalerjon earns a good and stable income.   There is demand for his taxi all throughout the year.

Currently Dalerjon's car has broken down and he needs to repair it.  However, he doesn't have enough of his own money and so he has applied to MDO Arvand, LLC for a loan.  Dalerjon thanks Arvand in advance for its support and hopes for a positive outcome.

loans.use: to repair his car

loans.name: Gulchehra

texts.ru: Гулчехра, 40 лет, замужем, мать 2 детей. В 2005 году она начала сельскохозяйственный бизнес. На сегодняшний день есть на 1,0 Га земли она выращивает лук. Дети и супруг помогают по хозяйству. Ежемесячная прибыль от бизнеса Гулчехры около 13,000 сом (KGS). Она обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку удобрений и сбор урожая экологически чистого лука. Доходы от кредита позволят Гулчехре развить ее бизнес и дать детям достойное высшее образование.
texts.en:
Gulchehra is 40 years old, married, and has two children. In 2005 she started farming. Today she has a 1.0 hectare land plot on which she cultivates onions. Her children and husband help around the farm. Gulchehra's monthly income from the business is about 13,000 som (KGS). 

She has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) in order to buy fertilisers and harvest organic onions. The funds from the loan will allow Gulchehra to develop her business and let her children get a worthy higher education.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for land cultivation and to harvest organic onions

loans.name: Teresia

texts.en:
Teresia is a married woman who has three children. She describes herself as honest. Teresia has operated a retail business where she sells clothes for the past two years. Her business is located in a busy area and her primary customers are locals.

Teresia will use the KES 60,000 loan to buy more clothes to add to her stock. She hopes that in the future, she will have a stable business. This is her third loan from SMEP Microfinance Bank with her previous loans having been successfully repaid.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to add to her stock.

loans.name: Riza

texts.en:
Riza hails from the town of MacArthur, Leyte. She is married and has one dependant who still attends school. Riza works hard to support the needs of her family. She raises and sells hogs with her income going towards food and school expenses.

Hog raising is at its peak this season, so Riza would like to repair the pig pen, but she does not have enough funds to pay for the materials needed.

Riza has requested a loan to buy materials like cement, nails and wood to repair the pig pen. With these materials, the pig pen could provide comfortable conditions for the livestock and also be prepared in order to expand the space so Riza can raise additional livestock. Slowly, she will be able to augment her earnings and continue to expand her hog raising activities.

For the future, Riza is determined to properly manage her source of income so she can become financially stable.

loans.use: to buy materials like cement, nails and wood to repair the pig pen.

loans.name: Jenne Ann

texts.en:
Jenne Ann is a 23-year-old woman who has a one-year-old dependent child. She lives in the town of MacArthur, Leyte, together with her husband and her child, who is her greatest joy. Jenne Ann owns and operates a sari-sari (variety) store. She sells merchandise like cooking oil, seasonings, coffee, powdered milk, single-serve vinegar pouches, soap, shampoo, eggs, and toiletries.

She would like to improve her earnings by purchasing assorted supplies to sell in the store like edible oil, soft drinks, biscuits, and beverages. These items will maintain the inventory of Jenne Ann's store causing more buyers to come. This will improve her earnings so she will be able to set some aside for future use.

Jenne Ann would like to roll out her capital to invest in other sources of income which will become productive in the years to come.

loans.use: to purchase assorted supplies like edible oil, soft drinks, biscuits, and beverages to sell in her store.

loans.name: Normelita

texts.en:
Normelita is a 47-year-old woman and a resident of Baybay, Leyte. She is married and blessed with an 18-year-old daughter. Her husband provides for their family through farming, as this is their main source of income.

Normelita helps her husband in providing for the needs of their daughter by making mats to sell. She uses leaves from the “buri” (the largest palm in the Philippines). These “buri” leaves are used in various products such as mats, native bags and farmers' hats, and sometimes they can be used as props.

Normelita has been doing this work for almost 20 years and wishes to continue to operate her business. For this, she is asking for a loan to buy “buri” leaves and dye.

In the future, Normelita plans to start other business opportunities like raising pigs in order to enhance their livelihood.

loans.use: to buy "buri" leaves and dye

loans.name: Everlyne

texts.en:
Everlyne is a married woman with 4 children who describes herself as determined.

She operates a beauty salon where she offers beauty services, and she has been involved in this business for 7 years. Her business is located in a busy area and her primary customers are locals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be inadequate working capital.

Everlyne will use the KES 40,000 loan to buy more beauty products for salon use. She will use the anticipated profits to expand her business.

This is her second loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. The previous loan was repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy more beauty products for salon use

loans.name: Fozia's Group

texts.en:
Fozia, aged 28, is a married woman living with her husband and three children in the area of Lahore. Fozia's husband is a welder, offering welding services in the local community, and she sells ladies' clothing items from her home to earn an income. Fozia buys the fabric at the market at low cost, then sews the clothing and sells it at a profit. She has gained a strong clientele among the ladies of her community, who appreciate her clothing selection and quality.

At present, there is a great demand for Fozia's clothing items, as the winter weather has begun and people need warmer clothes. She has therefore requested a loan, so she can provide a greater variety of garments to meet demand. Fozia is thankful to Kiva and Kiva's field partner BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety of garments to offer for sale, in order to fulfill customer demand.

loans.name: Sobia

texts.en:
Sobia is a 28-year-old lady who lives with her spouse and three children in the area of Lahore, Pakistan.

She is a responsible mother and she wants to make some savings so that she can provide better living facilities for her children. However, it seems impossible in the absence of a profitable source of income.

Her husband has been driving auto rickshaws for many years, and their income is sufficient to feed the entire family. Now her husband has to maintain the auto rickshaw body but he does not have a sufficient amount of money to fix the problem.

Therefore Sobia has requested a loan from Kiva’s field partner, BRAC Pakistan, so that her husband will be able to buy the auto rickshaw body.

Sobia hopes that she will be able to make enough savings before the time of their children's marriages. She thanks Kiva and its field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy a rickshaw body for her husband's transportation services business.

loans.name: Ema

texts.pt:
Mãe de 2 filhos já maiores de idade, uma já no lar e o outro ainda na sua responsabilidade e a estudar na 12 classe. Estudou até 7 classe, vive maritalmente na casa propria e conta com ajuda do esposo trabalhador do Estado. Está a repetir o credito pela quarta vez e sempre investiu no seu egocio de venda de produtos alimentares e bebidas em sua casa e a juntou material para construir casas para aluguer. Com o actual emprestimo pretende dar continuidade com o mesmo negocio.
Ela pretende comprar produtos como- farinha, acucar, amendoim, caldos, refrescos, oleo, etc para reforcar o seu negocio.
Seu maior desejo é desenvolver mais o seu negocio e construir casas para alugar.
sente se um pouco realizada pois consegue cuidar da sua família to e conta com ajuda do esposo, porem, depara se actualmente com os preços que tendem a subir drasticamente.
texts.en:
Ema is the mother of two grown children, one of whom still lives at home while the other is still under her care and in Year 12. Ema studied up until Year 7. She lives with her husband in her own home and is supported by her husband who works as a public servant.

Ema is about to take out a loan for the fourth time. Each time she invests in her business selling food and beverages from home and getting materials together to build houses to rent. With this loan she hopes to continue with her own business. Ema would like to buy products such as flour, sugar, peanuts, soup, soft drinks, oil, etc. to restock her business. Her main goal is to expand her business and build houses to rent out.

Ema feels quite fulfilled because she has managed to take care of her family and she is supported by her husband, however she is guarding herself against the price of goods which tends to drastically increase.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, peanuts, soup, soft drink, oil, etc. to restock her business.

loans.name: Rufiji Group

texts.en:
Amina, who is in her late 30s, is married with four kids. Three of her children are in school and one is still small.

Amina has been a food vendor for one year now. She works from 7 am to after midnight daily, and she is able to make a good monthly profit.

This will be Amina's first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She will use this loan to increase her mamalishe stock and serve more people. She dreams of expanding her business into a hotel.

Amina will share this loan with her loan group Rufigi, which has three members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to increase her mamalishe stock and serve more people.

loans.name: Maimuna

texts.pt:
Mãe de 4 filhos, 3 maiores de idade e cada um já responsavel por si, estando apenas a cuidar do mais novo, vive maritalmente  tem 51 anos de idade, vive de negocio a mais de 20 anos. esta a repetir o credito pela quarta vez, tem investido no seu negocio de venda de produtos e bebidas e na renovacao de alguns bens em sua casa e na construcao de uma nova casa.
com o actual emprestimo pretende comprar produtos para revender- carnes, frangos, farinha, diversas bebidas e na confeccao de alimentos. Seu desejo é erguer mais o seu negocio e terminar a construção de uma casa extra para aluguer.
Seu maior desafio é o facto do capital que  esta a usar não responder aos seus objectivos e com a actual subida de precos não lhe tem sido facil gerir a situacao, contudo, tem estado a lutar para o efeito
texts.en:
Maimuna is the mother of four children, three of whom are adults. Each one of them takes care of themselves while she is still taking care of the youngest. She lives with her husband and is 51 years old. She has been living off her business for more than 20 years. She is about to take out a loan for the fourth time and is investing in her business where she sells products and drinks as well as replacing some of the goods in her home and building a new house.

With this loan Maimuna plans to buy products to resell such as meat, chicken, flour and a variety of drinks as well as preparing meals. Her wish is to expand her business and finish building another house to rent out.

Maimuna's greatest challenge is the fact that the capital she has to spend does not match her goals and with the current rise in prices it has not been easy to manage her situation, however she is willing to fight to achieve her goals.

loans.use: to buy meat, chicken, flour and a variety of drinks and to prepare meals

loans.name: Jose Alvaro

texts.es: José, de 37 años de edad, es soltero, vive en una de las aldeas cercanas al municipio de Gracias, Lempira. Él se dedica a la elaboración y venta de ladrillos y teja de barro desde hace 10 años. Este trabajo lo realiza en su casa y lo vende a sus clientes de su comunidad.  Solicita la cantidad de 5,000 Lempiras para pago de mano de obra y otros materiales en la elaboración de teja y ladrillos de barro para vender. El préstamo le ayudara al aumento de la producción y venta. Sus metas son mejorar su calidad de vida y ampliar el negocio.
texts.en: José is 37 years old. He is single and lives in one of the villages close to the town of Gracias, Lempira. He has made and sold clay bricks and tiles for 10 years. He does this work at his home and sells to customers in his community. He is asking for the amount of 5,000 Lempiras to pay for labor and materials to make the clay tiles and bricks to sell. The loan will help him increase production and sales. His goals are to improve his quality of life and expand his business.

loans.use: to pay for labor and materials to make clay tiles and bricks to sell.

loans.name: David Angel

texts.es: Don David de 62 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y su hijastro, el se dedica a realizar viajes en su taxi desde hace 30 años, tiene muchos clientes que lo prefieren por la responsabilidad que tiene a la hora de manejar, con lo que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar los gastos que se le presentan en su hogar, el está solicitando un crédito para la compra de llantas y darle mantenimiento a su vehículo ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y poder tener mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: David is 62 years old. He lives in his own home with his wife and stepson. He has worked as a taxi driver for 30 years. He has a lot of customers who prefer him because of how responsibly he drives.  With what he earns from his job, he is able to pay for the household expenses. He is asking for a loan to buy tires and do maintenance on his vehicle. It is his only source of work and way to have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy tires and do maintenance on his vehicle.

loans.name: Daline

texts.en:
Daline, 32, is a married Lebanese woman and mother of three children, all of whom are still studying. Her husband is the family's main income earner. He is a retired soldier in the Lebanese army and works as a driver.

Today, with a new school year having started, Daline is in need of a loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. to pay her child's university expenses. This is her fifth loan from Kiva, and she says she is very happy that she will be able to ensure a good education for her child. That makes her very happy and thankful for Kiva.

loans.use: to pay her child's university expenses.

loans.name: Escalera Al Cielo Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “ESCALERA AL CIELO” iniciará el séptimo ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal German Busch, está compuesta por nueve  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Dionisia es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de manta, servicio de internet, venta de papas fritas, venta de alfombras, venta de venta de comida, venta de frutas, venta de faldas.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Dionisia es integrante, ella indica que hace doce meses que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es cliente de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio venta de papa frita; da a conocer que este negocio lo aprendió de su hermana hace más de cinco años.

El crédito que ahora sacará será para el aumento de capital (compra de papa frita por mayor) que adquirirá de las vendedoras mayoristas de la frontera Bolivia - Perú y posteriormente lo comercializará en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella esta casada y tiene dos hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud y las capacitaciones que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The “ESCALERA AL CIELO” will begin its seventh cycle in Pro Mujer as a part of the German Busch Focal Center. It is made up of nine members and is led by a board of directors of which Dionisia is the president. The businesses that the members have are varied. Among them are selling blankets, internet service, selling potato chips, selling rugs, selling food, selling fruit and selling skirts.

The loan they will take out will benefit the micro-business woman, including Dionisia. She indicates that the joined Pro Mujer twelve years ago at the invitation of a friend who is a client of the institution. She now has a business selling potato chips. She says that she learned this business from her sister more than five years ago.

The loan she will take out now will be to increase capital by buying potato chips wholesale. She will acquire them from wholesalers at the border between Bolivia and Peru and later sell them from her sales spot. This type of work will allow her to generate resources to support her family, as she is married and has two children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she says that she likes the area of health and the trainings offered by the institution.

loans.use: to buy potato chips wholesale.

loans.name: Evans

texts.en: Evans is a married man. He has 6 children. He operates a retail business where he sells sugar, flour, rice, bread, soap and other items. He has been involved in this business for 16 years. His business is located in a busy area and his primary customers are locals. He describes his biggest business challenge to be inadequate working capital. He will use the loan of 30,000 KES to buy more stock of sugar, flour, rice and other items. His business goal is to have a wholesale business within 5 years. He hopes that in the future, he will have a better life. This is his fourth loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. Previous loans were repaid successfully.

loans.use: to buy more stock of sugar, flour, rice and other items.

loans.name: Sahar

texts.en:
Greetings from Palestine. Sahar is 31 years old, married woman with 4 kids, and lives in Hebron city. Sahar has a small stockade in front of her house Her main business is to trade in livestock, such as goats, sheep, ewes, etc. Sahar needs the loan to buy sheep and ewes in order to raise them and after that sell them and make some profits. The business faces two main challenges. The first one is the lack of liquidity which limits her ability to expand her project, and the other challenge is the seasonality of the livestock trade.

For the future, Sahar hopes to expand her project by increasing the number of livestock.

Sahar thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to buy sheep and ewes in order to raise them and after that sell them for profit.

loans.name: Lourdesita

texts.en:
Lourdesita hails from the town of Carmen. She is 36-year-old married woman who has four school-aged children.

She operates a sari-sari (variety) store. She sells commodities like noodles, milk, sugar, seasonings, soap, shampoo and assorted canned goods.
Her sari-sari store is situated near her home and serves mostly neighbors and nearby residents.

Lourdesita would like to improve her earnings to become more productive and improve the family’s living condition. She would like to purchase soft drinks and liquors.

loans.use: to purchase soft drinks and liquors.

loans.name: Alberto

texts.en:
Alberto, 64, is a hardworking man. He sell lanzones fruit and calamay (a sticky sweet delicacy that is made of coconut milk, brown sugar, and ground glutinous rice) to help his wife, who also earns through sewing.

Alberto aims to expand his business, especially during peak season of lanzones. He plans to use the loan to buy more lanzones and calamay to sell in the Visayas and Mindanao areas.

He is confident that the loan can increase his sales, thus giving him and his wife a good life.

loans.use: to buy lanzones and calamay.

loans.name: Paul

texts.en:
Philemon is 26 years old. He is married with 5 children. 

He has had a motorcycle transport business for 2 years. Besides the motorcycle transport business, he also has an agrovet business. He will be using the loan to purchase a new motorcycle and hopes this will help him to get more income to educate his children and provide sufficient food for his family. 

His hopes and dreams for the future are to expand his business and make more income to support his family and expand his agrovet business

loans.use: to purchase a new motorcycle and he hopes this will help him to get more income to educate his children and provide sufficient food for his family.

loans.name: Fatmeh

texts.en: Fatmeh is a 31-year-old Lebanese married woman. She has three children. She operates a Mini Market in her town since 2011. Her husband is an employee and they work in collaboration with each other to meet their life needs. With her loan requested from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l, she will buy her children’s  books and school supplies, which makes her very glad that she will able to secure them a brilliant future.

loans.use: to buy her children’s books and school supplies .

loans.name: Faith

texts.en:
Faith is a married woman. She has two children. She describes herself as ambitious.

She operates a retail business where she sells clothes. She has been involved in this business for five years. Her business is located in a strategic place and her primary customers are locals.

She describes her biggest business challenge as inadequate working capital. She will use the KES 50,000 loan to buy more stock of clothes. Her business goal is to open a boutique within five years. She will use the anticipated profits to purchase additional stock.

loans.use: to buy more stock of clothes.

loans.name: Mazera

texts.en:
Mazera is a Kiva borrower. He has three children. He describes himself as patient.

He operates a retail business where he sells bags. He has been involved in this business for three years. His business is located in a good area and his primary customers are locals.

He will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more stock of bags. He hopes that in the future, he will have a better life. This is his first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy more stock of bags.

loans.name: Rebecca

texts.en:
Rebecca sends you her thanks for your generosity because her previous loan had entrenched her previous business. She was able to pay the maintenance and repair cost of her room for rent and the business is very progressive. The loan also helped her provide for their daily needs and expenses.

She is very positive that she could improve more her business if you will lend her an amount of 25,000 PHP. This new loan will also go to supplies of frozen food products she likewise sells to her regular clients as their additional source of income. Simultaneously, she could sustain the needs of her family.

Aside from growing her business, Rebecca aims to be able to attract more patrons. She also dreams that her youngest child will finish schooling. She meets every week with her *co-fellowship members to share stories of her work and to also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to pay for room maintenance and purchase frozen food products she sells in retail.

loans.name: Athman

texts.en:
Athman is a married man. He has three children. He describes himself as honest. He operates a retail business where he sells fish. He has been involved in this business for eight years. His business is located in a populated place and his primary customers are locals. He describes his biggest business challenge as inadequate working capital.

He will use the 100,000 KES loan to buy more stock of fish. His business goal is to be a fish supplier within five years. He hopes that in the future he will be the best fish supplier in town. This is his fourth loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank. His previous loans were repaid successfully. He will use the anticipated profits to improve his standard of living.

loans.use: to buy more stock of fish.

loans.name: Hameeda

texts.en:
Hameeda is a 55-year-old married mother of 5 children living in Multan, Pakistan. Her son is a rickshaw driver and worked for some contractors in the past. He has 15 years experience .

Hameeda's son was tired of serving for contractors, because they used to deduct from his salary for his minor errors and defects in the rickshaw, and because of this, he was being terrified by the threat of being fired almost daily. So Hameeda, looking at his face and seeing the disappointment all the time, could not resist and applied for the loan, as she wants her son to buy his very own rickshaw so that he could have the peace of mind which was missing while working for someone else.

Hameeda really appreciates the efforts of Kiva and its partner BRAC, who are helping her in hard times. She hopes the sooner he gets his rickshaw, he will be able to pay back Kiva and its partner BRAC.

loans.use: to buy an auto rickshaw for her son.

loans.name: Meri

texts.en:
This young lady is 24 years old and her name is Meri. She lives with her mother and sister in Ddmashen village of the Gegharkunik region.

Meri graduated Gavar State Pedagogical Institute in the faculty of Russian Language and Literature. It has been two years since she started her pedagogical activities. At the village school, she works as a teacher of Russian Language and Literature.

Meri mentions her pleasant work and devotion to it, and she feels greatly happy about her pupils’ success. She also helps a group of pupils at her flat with preparation of their lessons and explains the lessons that they did not manage to learn thoroughly.

Meri’s mother and sister are employed and they work at the food market. After their work, the whole family also takes care of their cute farm, and selling their products is an additional source of income for their family.

With this loan of 200,000 Armenian drams, Meri wants to buy a computer and also professional literature since she is beginner in pedagogy and she must work hard and develop her knowledge in this field.

loans.use: to buy a computer and also professional literature since she is beginner in pedagogy and she must work hard and develop her knowledge in this field.

loans.name: Sinat

texts.en:
As a farmer from Kang Meas District, Kampong Cham Province, Sinat, 33 years old, is working very hard on the rice field near her house. She is a hardworking mother of three children. She can earn approximately 5 USD a day. Being a farmer is the main work that she has done for nearly 10 years.

In this farming season, she is lacking money to buy some farm supplies. To continue her farming, Sinat is borrowing some money from Kiva to buy farm supplies like fertilizer, seeds, insecticides, and other related materials.

She hopes that this requirement will help to improve her living conditions. She is thankful to all lenders for their financial support.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies like fertilizer.

loans.name: Nenita

texts.en:
Nenita is a 52-year-old married woman who does domestic work for a living. She has five grown children. She lives in the town of Batuan, Bohol. She sells fresh fish to locals and nearby residents. She has a stall inside the marketplace in her town.

She is asking for a loan to purchase a variety of fish. In that way, she will be able to cope with demand. Thus, she will be able to roll-out her capital and continue to expand her livelihood. In the future, she is hoping to improve the family's living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of fish.

loans.name: Jelyn

texts.en:
To earn a living, Jelyn is engaged in the hog-raising business. She is a married woman from Carles, Iloilo. Jelyn is a mother of two dependents, aged 10 and 7 years old. Jelyn has been engaged in this business of raising pigs for seven years. In the future, she wants to improve her business for her children’s education.

As for now, Jelyn is requesting a loan of 10,000 PHP to buy additional piglets to raise and to pay for feed. Aside from this, she will also buy ready-to-wear products such as shirts, pants and underwear. Definitely, she plans to start other business opportunities.

loans.use: to buy additional piglets to raise and to pay for feed, and also ready-to-wear products such as shirts, pants, and underwear.

loans.name: Florida

texts.en:
Florida is a hardworking woman who always seeks an extra source of income. She is 46 years old, married, and has one teenage son who is in college. Florida's greatest hope is that her son finishes his studies and becomes a professional someday.

She wants her son to have a better future that’s why she is doing her best to meet her son's needs in his studies. Therefore, Florida is managing well her food vending business. She wants to borrow a loan of PHP 30,000 to buy raw meat and ingredients used in cooking foods. She will also use the loan to buy frozen foods to sell.

Florida hopes to earn more from her business to sustain her son's needs in finishing his study.

loans.use: to buy raw meat and ingredients used in cooking foods.

loans.name: Ramiz

texts.en:
Ramiz is 27 years old. He is married and lives with his wife and mother in the Bolnisi district.

Ramiz cultivates seasonal family-owned agricultural land and grows cucumber and haricot. He sells the harvest locally at a good price. As the income is only seasonal, Ramiz decided to start a an additional business and requested a loan.

The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables him to get a loan of 1,500 GEL. With the received credit he will purchase a used car and will start a taxi business. This will give him a stable income.

loans.use: to purchase a car and start a taxi business.

loans.name: Lydia

texts.en:
Lydia is 60 years old, and is married. Although they are not blessed with children, they still strive for their future. With their desire to share their blessings, Lydia adopted a child to care for and is now sending the child to school.

Lydia engages herself in retailing and livestock businesses. Meanwhile, her husband is also engaged in a farming business. Through her business, Lydia was able to improve their house and provide their own water system in the house.

Lydia wants to extend her business by investing more to gain more. In this connection, Lydia is asking for a loan of PHP 50,000 to buy drinks, condiments, breads, and many more items. Lydia believes that by managing the business well, she can invest more for their future.

loans.use: to buy drinks, condiments, breads, and many more items.

loans.name: Ghukas

texts.en:
Ghukas is 52 years old and he lives with his very large family in Varser village of Gegharkunik region. Ghukas has three sons and three daughters. He mentions that he has perfect children and a very lovely wife. All his children always helped each other in any work from school work to work around their farm, which always has been the main source of income for their big family.

Ghuaks is a very hardworking man. He always has been engaged in several types of work simultaneously. He worked as a locksmith, did construction work and always was farming. Now he is also the shepherd of his village.

Ghukas has cows, calves, sheep, lambs, pigs and chickens in his farm. He also perfectly manages potato cultivation in his farm and all his farm products he sells with the help of his wife at the city’s wholesale market.

Ghukas is a very active person and with all his occupations he decided to do some repairing of his house in order to meet the New Year with more comfort with his big family. Ghukas will use this loan of 650,000 Armenian drams for his cosmetic repairs on his house.

loans.use: to do some repairing of his house in order to meet the New Year with more comfort with his big family.

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en:
Mercy is a married woman. She has two children. She describes herself to be honest. She operates a baby care business. She has been involved in this business for seven years. Her business is located in a residential area and her primary customers are locals.

She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy mattresses and other equipment to provide better services.

Her business goal is to own a big baby care business within five years. This is her first loan with SMEP Microfinance Bank.

loans.use: to buy mattresses and other equipment

loans.name: Elenita

texts.en:
Elenita, from Valencia, Bohol, is dependent on her businesses, selling puto (steamed rice cakes) and raising hogs.

From the income that she generates from her businesses, she supports two children, ages 15 and 17.

She is asking a loan to buy additional piglets and feed as well as flour for her food business. Elenita hopes to make her businesses profitable.

In the future, Elenita hopes to pursue other business opportunities so she can uplift her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy piglets, feed and flour.

loans.name: Pon

texts.en:
A 43-year-old mother of two children, one of whom is in school, Pon is residing in Kampong Thom province. Growing rice and cassava have been the main sources of her family’s income since she was 18 years old. She also earns additional income by working as a paid worker, as well. Because of the drought, her crop has been not been growing well recently and she could earn very low income. This is the main challenge for her business nowadays.

In order to keep supporting her daughter’s studying, she is now applying for a Kiva loan via VisionFund in order to pay for the tuition fees of her daughter, who is pursuing a bachelor's degree in Nursing.

She hopes this loan will enable her daughter to get a good job in the future.

loans.use: to pay for the tuition fees of her daughter, who is pursuing a bachelor's degree in Nursing.

location.town: Kampong Thom Province, Prasat Balang district

loans.name: Sapenzia

texts.en:
Sapenzia is a married woman. She has eight children. She describes herself to be honest. She operates a retail business where she sells clothes. She has been involved in this business for 10 years. Her primary customers are locals. She describes her biggest business challenge to be low stock.

She will use the Kes 90,000 loan to buy more stock of clothes.This will enable her increase her sales.

Her business goal is to have a wholesale business within five years. She will plow the anticipated profits back into the business.

loans.use: to buy more stock of clothes

loans.name: Yanira Roxana

texts.es: Yanira tiene 32 años de edad y vive con su compañero de vida y sus 2 hijos de 12 y 7 años de edad, a los que trata de brindar lo mejor. Ella siempre busca lo mejor, por lo que se dedica a la elaboración y venta de piñatas desde hace 15 años, lo que le permite sacar adelante a su hogar. Yanira desea brindar mayor protección a su familia, por lo que solicita un crédito a FUSAI para comprar: cemento, arena, una puerta y pagar mano de obra para encementar el piso y colocar una puerta en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Yanira, 32, lives with her life partner and her two children, 12 and 7, whom she tries to give the best.

She's always looking for the best, so she has worked for 15 years making and selling piñatas, which allows her to get her household ahead.

Yanira wants to make her family more secure, so she's asking FUSAI for a loan to buy cement, sand, and a door, and to pay for labor to lay a cement floor and hang a door in her house.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and a door, and to pay for labor to lay a cement floor and hang a door in her house

loans.name: Tomas Adalberto

texts.es: Tomas vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus dos hijos, el se dedica a la venta de mariscos y verduras desde hace 8 años, su negocio esta ubicado cerca de su lugar de residencia y posee muchos clientes por los buenos precios, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el esta solicitando un credito para la compra de mariscos, pescado fresco y camaranos y asi poder continuar con sus ventas para tener mejores ingresos economicos.
texts.en:
Tomás lives in his own home with his wife and his two children.

He has earned a living for eight years selling shellfish and vegetables. His business is located near his home, and he has a lot of customers because of his good prices. With his earnings he's able to pay some of his household expenses.

He's requesting a loan to buy shellfish, fresh fish, and shrimp so he can continue with his sales and have a better income.

loans.use: to buy shellfish, fresh fish, and shrimp

loans.name: Gotitas De Cristal Group

texts.es:
